sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa myed pas/ chos thams cad skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa bdag gis shes par bya'o/ /

bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos rtogs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa la bslab par bya'o/ /
bdag gis chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrub pa khong du chud par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub par bslab par bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor de ni byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis

byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig /

sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i/ sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad sems can de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed de/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen pos/ gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por/ sems can gang yang phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
su/ yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang / bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don du/ sems
can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang
nyams su myong bar bya'o/ /de nas gzod bdag gis don tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas/ byang chub kyi tshogs mang po stsogs te/ bla na med pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad
par brlabs po che'i sems gang gis/ sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba/ de lta bu'i sems brlabs po che bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems brlabs po che
ni/ sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed/ gti mug gi sems mi skyed/ gtse ba'i sems mi skyed/ nyan thos kyi sems mi bskyed/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems
myi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems brlabs po che'o/ /des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed kyang / sems brlabs po che des rloms sems su mi bya'o/ /rab 'byor
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ mi sgul ba'i sems dang ldan par byas te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi sgul ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed cing / des rloms sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba'o/ /des sems can thams cad kyi phul du myi dmyigs
pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /
de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems ni sems can thams cad skyob cing / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ des rloms sems su

'gyur ba myed pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems te/ de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /
rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' pos/ rtag tu rgyun myi chad par chos 'dod par bya'o/ /chos la dga' bar bya'o/ /chos la mos par bya'o/ /chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor

la brtson par bya'o/ /de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ 'di ni chos shes bya'o/ /de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o/ /de la

chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la yon tan du blta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la

mos pa zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor de

ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/

chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa

stong pa nyid la gnas/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po

myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas/ dbang po rnams la
gnas/ stobs rnams la gnas/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas/ 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas/ tshad myed pa rnams

la gnas/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa rnams la gnas/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la gnas/

so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas/ byams pa chen po la gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du mi dmyigs
pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin chen

phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng ge rnam par brtse ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad las shin

tu 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges pa'i

rgyal mtshan dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od

gzer rab tu 'gyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dpung rnam par dgod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ tshig bla dgas

la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ phyogs su rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyam pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad yang dag

par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin la

gnas/ dbang po dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyun gyi rjes su song ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ smrel gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa

spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ tshol ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas la rten pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/

dri ma myed pa'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/

'od dri ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ glog gi sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad myi shes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ myi 'pham pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/

gzi brjid yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ myi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'jig pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/

zla ba dri ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ shes rab sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snang ba gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snang ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ye shes

dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rin chen

mtha'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos dam pa'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dga' ba spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos kyi 'phags pa'i ting nge

'dzin la gnas/ rnam par 'thor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yi ge mnyam par 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin
la gnas/ dmyigs pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'gyur ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mying nges par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/

gnas myed par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rab rib myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spyod pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ g.yo ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yul las rgal ba'i ting nge
'dzin la gnas/ yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sems myed par gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing bstsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/

byang chub kyi yan lag g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ spobs pa mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad las 'da' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/

yongs su gcod pa byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nem nur rnam par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas su bya ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/

rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa 'dor ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin

la gnas/ brda' dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba'i ting nge

'dzin la gnas/ mngon par dmyigs pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba myed pa'i ting nge

'dzin la gnas/ zad myi shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gzungs kyi blo gros kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'gal

ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'thun pa dang 'gal ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od dri ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ snying po dang ldan pa'i

ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zla ba dri ma myed par rgyas pa'i 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ glog gi 'od kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rgyan chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin

la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rdul myed cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs
pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas dmyigs su myed pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems myed
pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar

chags pa myed pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas

shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gsum pa/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shar dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi
slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po zhes bya ba de la spobs pa skyed cig /sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /

srog tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gso bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skyes bur lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shed can tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shed bdag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /

byed pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byed du 'jug pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su slong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshor ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshor du

'jug pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / shes pa por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthong ba por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rtag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yod par lta ba rab tu

spang ba dang / myed par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / phung por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / khams su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / skye mched du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar lta ba rab tu spang

ba dang / bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / pha rol tu phyin par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / stong pa nyid du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yang dag par spong bar lta ba

rab tu spang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dbang por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i

lam yan lag brgyad par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / bsam gtan tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / tshad med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par

'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rnam par thar par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma

myed pa dang / smon pa med par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i

stobs su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / myi 'jigs par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byams pa chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sems can yongs su smyin par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang /

sangs rgyas su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chos su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du /

sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du shes su
lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ myig du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ snar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
lcer lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sgrar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ drir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ror lta bar 'gyur ba

yin/ reg tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ myig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i rnam shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/

lce'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus
te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar

'gyur ba yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/

lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sa'i khams
su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chu'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mye'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rlung gi khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ nam mkha'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par

shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mying dang gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ skye mched

drug tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sred par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ len par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ srid par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ skye bar lta bar 'gyur

ba yin/ rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi

pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba

yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chen po stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus byas
stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta
bar 'gyur ba yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur

ba yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/
dbang por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'phags pa'i bden par
lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshad myed par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/

mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mngon par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/

ting nge 'dzin du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzungs kyi sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mi 'jigs par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ so so yang dag par rig par lta bar 'gyur

ba yin/ byams pa chen por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ snying rje chen por lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ /

sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dge 'dun du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/

chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs su dmyigs shing / dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshor bar dmyigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'du shes su dmyigs shing /
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ 'du byed du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par shes par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /myig du dmigs shing

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rna bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /snar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lcer dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba
skyed do/ /lus su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

lta ba skyed do/ /sgrar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /drir dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /ror dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /reg du dmigs

shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chos su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /

sna'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ lce'i rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ lus kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed
do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg par

dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ sna'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /

lus kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i

tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed
do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor bar dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chu'i khams su dmigs shing

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /me'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rlung gi khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /nam mkha'i khams su dmigs

shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /ma rig pa dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'du byed du dmigs shing /

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mying dang gzugs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /skye mched drug du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i

tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /reg par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshor bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sred par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /len par dmigs

shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /srid par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /skye bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rga shir dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i

tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /nang stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid

du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /don dam pa stong pa

nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mtha'

las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du

dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa

nyid du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba

skyed do/ /yang dag par spong bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dbang por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /
stobs su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /'phags pa'i lam lag brgyad par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul
gyis lta ba skyed do/ /'phags pa'i bden par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /bsam gtan du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshad med par dmigs shing /
dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par thar par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /

mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgur dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par dmigs shing / dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /mngon par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /ting nge 'dzin du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /gzungs kyi sgor dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /myi 'jigs par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /so so yang dag par rig par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /byams pa chen

por dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /snying rje chen por dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba

skyed do/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya bar dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /byang chub tu dmigs
shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /sangs rgyas su dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chos su dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /dge 'dun du dmigs
shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar dmigs shing / dmigs pa'i

tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta ba dang / 'du shes su lta ba dang / 'du byed du lta ba dang /

rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna bar lta ba dang / snar lta ba dang / lcer lta ba dang / lus su lta ba dang / yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir gzugs
su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sgrar lta ba dang / drir lta ba dang / ror lta ba dang / reg tu lta ba dang / chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i

rnam par shes par lta ba dang / sna'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / lce'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang / lus kyi rnam par shes par lta ba dang / yid kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg

par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i

phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta

ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir sa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chu'i khams su lta ba dang / me'i khams

su lta ba dang / rlung gi khams su lta ba dang / nam mkha'i khams su lta ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta ba dang /

ming dang gzugs su lta ba dang / skye mched drug du lta ba dang / reg par lta ba dang / tshor bar lta ba dang / sred par lta ba dang / len par lta ba dang / srid par lta ba dang / skye bar lta ba dang / rga shir lta bar 'gyur ba
yin/ de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol

tu phyin par lta ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / phyi nang

stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chen po stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / mtha' las

'das pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong

pa nyid du lta ba dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag

par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yang dag par spong par lta ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba dang / dbang por lta ba dang / stobs su lta ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag du lta ba dang / lam du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/

de'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan du lta ba dang / tshad med par lta ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang / rnam par thar par lta ba dang / mthar gyis

gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par lta ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du lta ba dang / gzungs kyi sgor

lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ myi 'jigs par lta ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lta ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos

ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir sems can yongs su smyin par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang chub tu lta ba dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su lta ba dang /

dge 'dun du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas

pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang pa'i phyir myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod spobs pa skyed cig /rab 'byor kyis

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing khams gsum gyi

khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la yang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la

'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'byor kyis

smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad/ chos gang yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong / 'gag pa dang / 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang 'ong ba dang 'gro ba

dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang la skye ba med cing / 'gag pa myed pa dang / 'phel ba myed cing 'grib pa myed pa dang / 'ong ba myed cing 'gro ba myed pa

dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed cing rnam par byang ba myed pa de la nyan thos kyi sems myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems myed do/ /byang chub kyi sems myed do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems myed do/ /tshe dang ldan sha ra dwa ti'i bu

'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mongs ma yin pa'i sems so/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod

kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa myed pa/ khongs su chud pa myed pa / de lta bu'i sems la yang chags pa myed do/ /zhes smras pa de ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bas na

gzugs kyang chags pa myed do/ /tshor ba yang chags pa myed do/ /'du shes kyang chags pa myed do/ /'du byed kyang chags pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do/ /myig kyang chags pa myed do/ /rna ba yang chags pa

myed do/ /sna yang chags pa myed do/ /lce yang chags pa myed do/ /lus kyang chags pa myed do/ /yid kyang chags pa myed do/ /gzugs kyang chags pa myed do/ /sgra yang chags pa myed do/ /dri yang chags pa myed do/ /ro yang chags

pa myed do/ /reg kyang chags pa myed do/ /chos kyang chags pa myed do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do/ /

lce'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags

pa myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa

myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do/ /sa'i khams kyang chags pa myed do/ /chu'i khams kyang chags pa myed do/ /mye'i khams

kyang chags pa myed do/ /rlung gi khams kyang chags pa myed do/ /nam mkha'i khams kyang chags pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chags pa myed do/ /ma rig pa yang chags pa myed do/ /'du byed kyang chags pa myed do/ /

rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do/ /mying dang gzugs kyang chags pa myed do/ /skye mched drug kyang chags pa myed do/ /reg pa yang chags pa myed do/ /tshor ba yang chags pa myed do/ /sred pa yang chags pa myed do/ /

len pa yang chags pa myed do/ /srid pa yang chags pa myed do/ /skye ba yang chags pa myed do/ /rga shi yang chags pa myed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa myed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang

chags pa myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa yang chags pa myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /chen po

stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang

chags pa myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /dbang po

rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /stobs rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /byang chub yan lag rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams

kyang chags pa myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /

mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang chags pa myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chags pa

myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /so so yang

dag par rig pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /snying rje chen po yang chags pa myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa

nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa myed do/ /tshor ba yang chags pa myed do/ /

'du shes kyang chags pa myed do/ /'du byed kyang chags pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do/ /myig kyang chags pa myed do/ /rna ba yang chags pa myed do/ /sna yang chags pa myed do/ /lce yang chags

pa myed do/ /lus kyang chags pa myed do/ /yid kyang chags pa myed do/ /gzugs kyang chags pa myed do/ /sgra yang chags pa myed do/ /dri yang chags pa med do/ /ro yang chags pa myed do/ /reg kyang chags

pa myed do/ /chos kyang chags pa myed do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa yang chags pa

myed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa

yang chags pa myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed

do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg

pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do/ /sa'i khams kyang chags pa myed do/ /chu'i khams kyang chags pa myed do/ /mye'i khams kyang chags pa myed do/ /

rlung gi khams kyang chags pa myed do/ /nam mkha'i khams kyang chags pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang chags pa myed do/ /ma rig pa yang chags pa myed do/ /'du byed kyang chags pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa yang chags

pa myed do/ /mying dang gzugs kyang chags pa myed do/ /skye mched drug kyang chags pa myed do/ /reg pa yang chags pa myed do/ /tshor ba yang chags pa myed do/ /sred pa yang chags pa myed do/ /len pa yang chags pa myed do/ /srid pa yang chags

pa myed do/ /skye ba yang chags pa myed do/ /rga shi yang chags pa myed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa myed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa med do/ /

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang chags pa myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /

phyi stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa

myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid

kyang chags pa myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang

chags pa myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang chags

pa myed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /yang dag par spong pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /dbang po rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /

stobs rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang chags pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /

bsam gtan rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /mthar gyis gnas

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang chags pa myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin

rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig par rnams kyang chags pa

myed do/ /snying rje chen po yang chags pa myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang chags pa myed do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do/ /smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma zad de/

byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa

nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rab 'byor kyis smras pa de yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /

nyan thos rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta yin na/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs

su chud pa myed do/ /tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /'du shes kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /'du byed kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa

myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /myig kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rna ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi

phyir zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /sna yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lce yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lus

kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /yid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su

chud pa myed do/ /sgra yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /dri yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /ro yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /reg kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /chos kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /myig gi rnam par

shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs

su chud pa myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lce'i

'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa

nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong

pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis

tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /sa'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /chu'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /mye'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rlung gi khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /

nam mkha'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /ma rig pa yang rang bzhin stong

pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /'du byed kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /

mying dang gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /skye mched drug kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid

kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sred pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /len

pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /srid pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /skye ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs

su chud pa myed do/ /rga shi yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid

kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud

pa myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid

kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa

nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed

cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /dbang po rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /stobs rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed

do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i lam lag brgyad pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /

'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams

kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa rnam

kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rnam par

thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed

cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /

so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /snying rje chen po yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang
bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do// //

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bzhi pa/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs

su chud pa myed do/ /tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /'du shes kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /'du byed kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid

kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /myig kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /

rna ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /sna yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lce yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing

khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lus kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /yid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /gzugs kyang

rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sgra yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /dri yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing

khongs su chud pa myed do/ /ro yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /reg kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /chos kyang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing

khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud

pa myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /

sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus

te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa las

byung ba'i tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sna'i

'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa

myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /sa'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /chu'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su

chud pa myed do/ /mye'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rlung gi khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /nam mkha'i

khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /ma rig pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid

kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /'du byed kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa

myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /mying dang gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /skye mched drug kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing

khongs su chud pa myed do/ /reg pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /tshor ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /sred pa yang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /len pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /srid pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa

myed do/ /skye ba yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rga shi yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong

pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud

pa myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /

dom dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /'dus ma byas

stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /thog ma

dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rang bzhin

stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rang gi mtshan

nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa

stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /dbang po rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/

zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /stobs rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs

su chud pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs

su chud pa myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /tshad myed pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /gzugs

myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ mthar

gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid

kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing

khongs su chud pa myed do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing

khongs su chud pa myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs

su chud pa myed do/ /snying rje chen po yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa med do// /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /thams cad

shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rang

bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa myed cing khongs su chud pa myed do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ sems myed pa'i phyir/ sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang

ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma zad de/ gzugs myed pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do/ /tshor ba myed pa yang tshor ba la chags pa myed do/ /'du shes med pa yang 'du shes la chags pa med do/ /'du byed myed pa yang 'du byed la

chags pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa myed pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do/ /myig myed pa yang myig la chags pa myed do/ /rna ba myed pa yang rna ba la chags pa myed do/ /sna myed pa yang sna la chags pa myed do/ /lce myed pa

yang lce la chags pa myed do/ /lus med pa yang lus la chags pa myed do/ /yid myed pa yang yid la chags pa myed do/ /gzugs myed pa yang gzugs la chags pa myed do/ /sgra myed pa yang sgra la chags pa myed do/ /dri myed pa yang

dri la chags pa med do/ /ro myed pa yang ro la chags pa myed do/ /reg myed pa yang reg la chags pa myed do/ /chos myed pa yang chos la chags pa med do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa yang myig gi rnam par shes pa la chags

pa myed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myed pa yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa myed pa yang sna'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa myed pa yang lce'i rnam par shes pa la chags

pa med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa yang lus kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa myed pa

yang myig gi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa myed do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang sna'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg

pa myed pa yang lce'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa myed do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa myed do/ /myig gi 'dus

te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed pa yang myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba myed pa la chags pa myed do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed pa yang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba myed pa la chags pa myed do/ /

sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed pa yang sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba myed pa la chags pa myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed pa yang lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba myed pa la chags pa med do/ /

lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed pa yang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa myed do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba myed pa yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba

la chags pa myed do/ /sa'i khams myed pa yang sa'i khams la chags pa myed do/ /chu'i khams myed pa yang chu'i khams la chags pa myed do/ /mye'i khams myed pa yang mye'i khams la chags pa myed do/ /rlung gi khams

myed pa yang rlung gi khams la chags pa myed do/ /nam mkha'i khams myed pa yang nam mkha'i khams la chags pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams myed pa yang rnam par shes pa'i khams la chags pa myed do/ /ma rig pa myed

pa yang ma rig pa la chags pa myed do/ /'du byed myed pa yang 'du byed la chags pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa myed pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do/ /mying dang gzugs myed pa yang mying dang gzugs la chags pa myed do/ /

skye mched drug myed pa yang skye mched drug la chags pa myed do/ /reg pa myed pa yang reg pa la chags pa myed do/ /tshor ba myed pa yang tshor ba la chags pa myed do/ /sred pa myed pa yang sred pa la chags pa myed do/ /len pa myed

pa yang len pa la chags pa myed do/ /srid pa myed pa yang srid pa la chags pa myed do/ /skye ba myed pa yang skye ba la chags pa myed do/ /rga shi myed pa yang rga shi la chags pa myed do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa yang sbyin

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa myed do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa myed do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa myed do/ /

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa myed do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa myed pa yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa myed do/ /shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa myed pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa myed do/ /nang stong pa nyid myed pa yang nang stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /phyi stong pa nyid myed pa yang phyi stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /phyi nang stong pa

nyid myed pa yang phyi nang stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /chen po stong pa nyid myed pa yang chen po stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /don dam pa stong pa

nyid myed pa yang don dam pa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid myed pa yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid myed pa yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la

chags pa myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la

chags pa myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la chags pa myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid myed pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid myed

pa yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myed pa yang mi dmigs pa stong

pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa yang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /dngos po med pa'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myed pa yang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med pa yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /yang dag par spong pa med pa

yang yang dag par spong ba myed pa la chags pa med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa med pa yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /dbang po myed pa yang dbang po rnams la chags pa med do/ /stobs myed pa
yang stobs rnams la chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag med pa yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la chags pa med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lags brgyad pa myed pa yang 'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa la chags pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa med pa yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /bsam gtan med pa yang bsam gtan rnams la chags pa med do/ /

tshad med pa med pa yang tshad myed pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa yang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa med pa yang rnam par
thar pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa myed pa yang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /

mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa med yang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa med pa la chags pa med do/ /mngon par shes pa med pa yang mngon par shes pa rnams la chags

pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin med pa yang ting nge 'dzin rnams la chags pa med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo med pa yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i

stobs rnams la chags pa myed do/ /mi 'jigs pa myed pa yang mi 'jigs pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la chags pa myed do/ /byams pa chen

po med pa yang byams pa chen po la chags pa med do/ /snying rje chen po med pa yang snying rje chen po la chags pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /

thams cad shes pa nyid med pa yang thams cad shes pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med pa yang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa yang

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa med do/ /tshor ba med pa yang tshor ba la chags pa med do/ /'du shes med

pa yang 'du shes la chags pa med do/ /'du byed myed pa yang 'du byed la chags pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa med pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /myig med pa yang myig la chags pa myed do/ /rna ba

myed pa yang rna ba la chags pa myed do/ /sna myed pa yang sna la chags pa med do/ /lce myed pa yang lce la chags pa myed do/ /lus myed pa yang lus la chags pa myed do/ /yid myed pa yang yid la chags pa myed do/ /gzugs
