myed pa yang gzugs la chags pa myed do/ /sgra med pa yang sgra la chags pa med do/ /dri med pa yang dri la chags pa med do/ /ro med pa yang ro la chags pa med do/ /reg med pa yang reg la chags pa med do/ /chos med pa

yang chos la chags pa med do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa myed pa yang mig gi rnam par shes pa la chags pa myed do/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa med pa yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /sna'i rnam par shes

pa med pa yang sna'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa med pa yang lce'i rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa myed pa yang lus kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med

do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa med pa yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa med pa yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa med pa yang rna ba'i 'dus te reg

pa la chags pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa med pa yang sna'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa myed do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa med pa yang lce'i 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa med pa yang lus kyi 'dus

te reg pa la chags pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myed pa yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la chags pa med do/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do/ /

rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa yang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa yang sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa

med do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa yang lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa yang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor

ba la chags pa med do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba med pa yang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la chags pa med do/ /sa'i khams myed pa yang sa'i khams la chags pa med do/ /chu'i khams myed pa yang
chu'i khams la chags pa med do/ /mye'i khams med pa yang me'i khams la chags pa med do/ /rlung gi khams med pa yang rlung gi khams la chags pa med do/ /nam mkha'i khams med pa yang nam mkha'i khams

la chags pa med do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa yang rnam par shes pa'i khams la chags pa med do/ /ma rig pa med pa yang ma rig pa la chags pa med do/ /'du byed med pa yang 'du byed la chags pa med do/ /

rnam par shes pa myed pa yang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do/ /ming dang gzugs med pa yang ming dang gzugs la chags pa med do/ /skye mched drug med pa yang skye mched drug la chags pa med do/ /reg pa med pa

yang reg pa la chags pa med do/ /tshor ba med pa yang tshor ba la chags pa med do/ /sred pa med pa yang sred pa la chags pa med do/ /len pa med pa yang len pa la chags pa med do/ /srid pa med pa yang srid pa la chags

pa med do/ /skye ba med pa yang skye ba la chags pa myed do/ /rga shi myed pa yang rga shi la chags pa med do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa med pa yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa myed do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa

yang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa med do/ /nang stong pa nyid med pa yang nang stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /phyi stong pa nyid med pa yang phyi stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa yang phyi nang stong

pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /chen po stong pa nyid med pa yang chen po stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid med

pa yang don dam pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa yang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa yang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa yang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa yang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /

dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa yang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid med pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid med pa
yang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid med pa yang mi

dmigs pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid med pa yang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /dngos po med

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa med pa yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /yang dag par spong ba med

pa yang yang dag par spong ba rnams la chags pa med do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa med pa yang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /dbang po med pa yang dbang po rnams la chags pa med do/ /stobs med pa
yang stobs rnams la chags pa med do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag med pa yang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la chags pa med do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myed pa yang 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa la chags pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa med pa yang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /bsam gtan med pa yang bsam gtan rnams la chags pa med do/ /tshad med pa
med pa yang tshad med pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa yang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa med pa yang
rnam par thar pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa med pa yang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa med pa med pa yang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la chags pa med do/ /mngon
par shes pa med pa yang mngon par shes pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin med pa yang ting nge 'dzin rnams la chags pa med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo med pa yang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la chags
pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs med pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la chags pa med do/ /mi 'jigs pa med pa yang mi 'jigs pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /so so yang dag par

rig pa med pa yang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /byams pa chen po med pa yang byams pa chen po la chags pa med do/ /snying rje chen po med pa yang snying rje chen po la chags pa med do/ /

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa med pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do/ /thams cad shes pa nyid med pa yang thams cad shes pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid

med pa yang lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma
yin pa'i sems des kyang chos thams cad la dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do/ /mngon par chags par 'gyur ba med pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang
spobs pa skye'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig /gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan

'das de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /

de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos shes bya/

gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa

yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo / /sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims

srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo / /sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bzod pa sgom pa ma

yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bzod pa sgom mo/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus rtsom
pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
gnas shing / bsam gtan skyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams can kyi don du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan skyed do/ /sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab sgom mo/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni

sems can 'di snyed cig phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar myi bya'o zhe 'am/ sems can 'di

snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su dpags pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems

can thams cad kyi don tu go cha chen po gyon to/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar
bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang bzod

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams

cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /

bdag gis kyang nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang

phyi stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs
su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang chen po stong
pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang 'dus byas
stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can
thams cad kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa

nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang

dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems

can thams cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /

bdag gis kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su
rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang

dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang dngos

po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi
la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang yang dag par spong pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang yang dag par spong

ba bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang dbang po lnga la gnas par bya'o/ /

sems can thams cad kyang dbang po lnga la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang stobs lnga la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang stobs lnga la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas
par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang bsam
gtan rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang tshad med pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang tshad med pa rnams la
sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag
kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /

sems can thams cad kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas par bya'o/ /
sems can thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams
cad kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang gzungs
kyi sgo rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad
kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang myi 'jigs bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang so so yang dag
par rig pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang snying rje chen po la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang snying

rje chen po la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /zhes

bya bar sems bskyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag /nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyis/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su

bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don tu yongs su myi bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyam par myi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong

ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

dang ldan pa'i yid la byas pas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems skyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes
nye bar gnas te/ des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ gtong pa yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa

yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/

pha rol tu phyin pa de dag mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha

ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de/ sems

can thams cad dang mthun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos pa mi skyed na/ so so'i skye bo'i sa lta smos kyang mi smos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam

par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po rnams pa mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang /

sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i

yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des rloms sems su mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir

tshul khrims de yang mi dmigs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de

ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems

can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha

rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod

pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par myi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid

la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing / bzod pa mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ta dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs

su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i

yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing / dge

ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya

bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don tu brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing / brtun mi ngas pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson

'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas

ma yin gyi/ rnams pa mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan

gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid

la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson 'grus des rloms sems su mi byed cing / brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha

ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o/ /

tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/

byang chub sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su
srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan

gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa yongs su sgom
ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed de/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /
tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
ba la sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams gyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang
sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang rloms sems su myi byed cing / bsam gtan de yang mi
dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin to/ /de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang / sems can thams cad
dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongs su
srung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos
de dag la de ltar bzod pa la mos shing rten te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ /
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas

dang ldan pa'i yid las bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas
te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol
tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas
pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid las bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di
ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ nam byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed

mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mnyam par gzhag ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro myong bar mi byed do/ /bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/
bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang 'grogs pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /
gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben pa mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong bas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/

yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang mi byed de/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po lnga pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la shar phyogs
kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams
che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyind par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu
'phrul gyis rnams par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa
rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig
sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten

gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing / ming yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig

na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa

mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du rjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa
mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su

dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra rjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /byang shar kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyind par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad
cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha

chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /lho nub gyi phyogs

'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs

rjes su sgrog go/ /nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/

'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul

gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing mying

yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /

rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod

pa ched du brjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing

yongs su dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par

zhugs shes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de/

de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la

nye bar bsgrub te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ rnam par dpyod pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i

dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa

rnams kyi de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal ba
yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed/ sdug bsngal yang myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /
de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs med pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos

kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /da snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs
myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par

byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ gcugs myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten

chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu
yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtugs

pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs
kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ namakha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ namakha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnams pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang

dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes par mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrub te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod

do zhes chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad myed pa 'di dag dang / gzugs

myed pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa

las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/

rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ rnam par dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/

dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed
pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed/ sdug bsngal yang

myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/

ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan

pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i

mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/

ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de mi dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig
rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtug pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das

te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams

cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnams shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas

skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du
shes myed myin skye mched la mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan

'di dag dang / tshad myed pa 'di dag dang / gzugs myed pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo

ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/

dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud

gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ rnam par dpyod pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang

bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/

dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed/ sdug

bsngal yang myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod

pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtug pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /

de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings
kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad myed
pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par

bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/

ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ namakha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de myi dmyigs pa'i
tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms
pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las

yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad
du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha'

yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod do zhes chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/
'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te nam byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad myed pa 'di dag dang / gzugs myed pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnams pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i

tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas

dben/ sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrub te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa

dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ rnam par dpyod pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can

bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyi myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de
la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa/ btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrub te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang

spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed/ sdug bsngal yang myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de byams pa dang ldan
pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/

namakha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs med pa/

gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par
spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/

'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems
rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ bcugs pa myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/
namakha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams
nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ namakha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha'
yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnams shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las

yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod do zhes chung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du
shes med myin skye mched la mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad myed pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i

chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa

nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar

bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dag bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyi myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde
ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o/ /zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde
ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems
rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs pa myed pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i

mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs pa med pa/ gnod pa med

pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /

de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs pa med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas

pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis
pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas

par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi
byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes

pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod do zhes chud zad myed pa'i

skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /

'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad myed pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /

tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /

de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la

nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin

las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dag bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba

lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang

spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /

de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings

kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs
med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par

byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms
pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan
pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas
pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams
nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du namakha'
mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched

las yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod do zhes chung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes
med min skye mched la mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan

'di dag dang / tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po

la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad med
pa/ bcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyi klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang

ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/

'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis
pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu

rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ bcugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ ltod pa med pa/
yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de 'dod pas dben/
sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog

pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongasu dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ rnam par dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis

pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dag bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyi myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/

bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang /
yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal yang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du
gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar

bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod do/ zhes chung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams

cad du chung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes med myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas/ nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang /

gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la brjod cing 'chad pa dang / ston cing 'grel la rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi nga ro dang / de dag gi skyon dang / 'byung ba yang tshul

bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
de dag gis/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
yang rung ste/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam ste/ /

sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /snyam du sems shing yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa dang / sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'di ni/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang /

tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed pa 'di
ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/

bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lags
dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i yan lags dang / bsam gtan gsum pa'i yan lags dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i yan lags dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / nam mkha'

mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / chung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med myin skye mched de dag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag

med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms

par 'jug pa de dag mi dmyigs shing / de dag gis rlom sems med pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad

du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du dbang po lnga bsgom pa dang /

rnam pa thams cad du stobs lnga bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi yan lags bdun bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i

bden pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom

pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan

ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom

pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mi 'jigs pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa

thams cad du byams pa chen po bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du thams cad shes pa nyid

bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams

cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed do/ /snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba'i nyams su byed do/ /dga' ba'i ting nge
'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag nyid kyis dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so/ /btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams kyi zag pa zad par bya ba la
rab tu gzhol bar byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /

tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di
ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang /

tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen

pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spangs pa dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du/ brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug

pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing / de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang med la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par

yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang

ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang la/ de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /

bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par yang dag par 'jug par mi

byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa

sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid

shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs

pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs
