pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i

tshul gyis ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i

tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing mnyam par bzhag par shes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po

'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /mi rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bde zhes bya bar shes pa

mi 'jug /sdug bsngal zhes bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / bdag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /bdag med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa dang / sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug /mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi

'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang gzugs myed pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes

pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i

theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig rten pa'i chos la yang shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par

mi byed kyang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan

pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen

po la gnas shes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang

des sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmyigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmyigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang

mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des bzod pa yang mi dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang

chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes

bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des brtson 'grus kyang mi

dmigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la yang dag par gnas kyang / des bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des dge ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs shing / mi dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas
dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyang mi dmigs shing shes rab kyang mi dmigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi

dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma 'dres

pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid bsgom

mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas

bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid

sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang

ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma 'dres pas bsgom

pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/ de mi

dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed

pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi sgom

mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas

bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom

mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam

par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad myed

pa bzhi sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres
pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas

bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres

pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom mo/ /rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres

pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/

de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rigs pa bzhi bsgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

snying rje chen po sgom mo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad sgom

mo/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen pos/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so/ /gzugs dmigs su myed pa'i phyir gzugs

shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /tshor ba dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /'du shes dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'du shes shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /

'du byed dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /myig dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ myig ces bya ba 'di

ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rna ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rna ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /sna dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sna zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /lce dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ lce zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /

lus dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ lus zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /yid dmyigs su med pa'i phyir/ yid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /gzugs dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /

sgra dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /dri dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ dri zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /ro dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ ro zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /reg dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ reg

ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /myig gi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ myig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rna ba'i rnam

par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa dmigs

su myed pa'i phyir/ lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i

phyir/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su med pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i

'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su med pa'i phyir/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya

ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya

ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs

su myed pa'i phyir/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni

mying tsam du zad do/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs su

med pa'i phyir/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba

'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /sa'i khams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sa'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /chu'i khams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chu'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /mye'i khams dmyigs su

myed pa'i phyir/ mye'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rlung gi khams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rlung gi khams shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /nam mkha'i khams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ nam mkha'i khams shes bya ba

'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rnam par shes pa'i khams dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa'i khams shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /ma rig pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ma rig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /'du byed

dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /mying dang gzugs dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ mying dang gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni mying

tsam du zad do/ /skye mched drug dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ skye mched drug ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /tshor ba dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ tshor ba

zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /sred pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sred pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /len pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ len pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /srid pa dmyigs su med pa'i phyir/ srid pa zhes

bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /skye ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rga shi dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rga shi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su myed

pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do/ /bsam gtan

gyis pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying

tsam du zad do/ /nang stong pa nyid dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /phyi stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su

myed pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /chen po stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/

chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'dus byas stong

pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ mtha' las

'das pa stong pa nyid zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i

phyir/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chos thams

cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces

bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su med pa'i phyir/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di

ni mying tsam du zad do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar

gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul

gyi rkang pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /dbang po rnams dmigs su myed pa'i phyir/ dbang po lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /stobs rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ stobs lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag

rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /lam dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /'phags pa'i bden

pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /bsam gtan rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /tshad myed pa rnams dmyigs su

myed pa'i phyir/ tshad myed pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams

dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /

rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams dmyigs

su myed pa'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ gzungs kyi sgo zhes bya

ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams dmyigs su med pa'i phyir/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di

ni mying tsam du zad do/ /so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /snying rje chen po dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ snying rje chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /sangs

rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /ma nor ba de

bzhin nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /chos

nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chos nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /chos kyi dbyings dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /chos kyi gnas nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i
phyir/ chos kyi gnas nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /chos skyon myed pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ /chos skyon myed pa nyid zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /

yang dag pa'i mtha' dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /byang chub dmyigs su myed ba'i phyir/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /sangs rgyas dmyigs su myed pa'i

phyir/ sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ /zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// //

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po drug pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar tu

mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas shing / sems can yongs su smyin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba'i tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/ sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i

theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to/ /de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems can yongs su smyin par byed kyang /

de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang myi 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang myi 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang myi 'byung ngo / /de gnyis su myed pa'i sa la gnas shing / lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams

shing yongs su 'dzin to/ /de nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi bar du/ theg pa de dang nam du yang myi 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs

rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi 'am myi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor

ro/ /de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyis khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang yon tan brjod pa

mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na myed pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/

rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog pa mdzad do/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do/ /zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs rjes su brjod pa mdzad do/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig

rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa chen po'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes/

grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs rjes su brjod pa mdzad do/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gis bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing

'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa chen po'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes

bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyis
'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa chen po'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor

lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing /

'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa/ theg pa chen po'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams

yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob

ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa'i zhes bya ba

zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /steng gi phyogs kyi

'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po theg pa chen po/ bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa chen po'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su

brjod pa mdzad do/ /de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la

'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos so/ /go cha chen po bgos shes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bgyi ba lags

de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha gyon cing 'di lta ste/

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin

pa'i go cha bgos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi

go cha bgos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid

kyi go cha bgos/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po

myed pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong pa'i go cha bgos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i go cha bgos/ dbang

po'i go cha bgos/ stobs kyi go cha bgos/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi go cha bgos/ lam gyi go cha bgos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam gtan gyi go cha bgos/ tshad myed pa'i go cha bgos/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms

par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i go cha bgos/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i go cha bgos/ mngon par shes pa'i go cha

bgos/ ting nge 'dzin gyi go cha bgos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi go cha bgos/ myi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos/ snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos

ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste

shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang

ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma

snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang

bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /steng gi

phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi

khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi

bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam

pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam

pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam

pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung

po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i

sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag rnam par langs

nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ byol song gi skye gnas kyi

sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bya ba'i sgra

brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ byol song gi skye gnas de dag nas rnam

par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des stong gsum gyi stong

chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba

'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed

par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang

sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can

dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /

de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag

sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi

khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/

sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de

dang dag tu skye'o/ /des byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/

dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang

na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i

phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems

can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba

de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jigs rten gyi khams
gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs bsgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba

dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs

shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad
myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems

can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par

langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye 'o/ /des nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la
phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba

dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs

shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas
te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang

sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag tu skye'o/ /des steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/

sems can dmyal ba'i mye'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod

do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ sems can dmyal ba de dag
nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang

de dag tu skye'o/ /des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skyes gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye

gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i
sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jigs rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de

dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad
zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs bsgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang /
gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i
sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/

dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas

rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye
ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag

thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang /

gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas

rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de

dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyis khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye

gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra

brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol

gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom

ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag tu skye'o/ /des shar lho'i phyogs mtsham kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems

can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal

lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga'

ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems

can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de

la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde

ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par
langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye 'o/ /des nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skyes gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas

kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
'jig rten de dag nas rnam par lang nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /des 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig

rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal

ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song

gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs

shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye 'o/ /des steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye

gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /

dbyangs sgrog go/ /de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang bde ba 'thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gi

skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs

rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gi lam po che'i bzhi mdor
'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag gcig mngon par sprul la/ de ltar mngon par sprul nas/ ngan song gi

sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog /chos kyi sgra sgrog /dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog par 'gyur la/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal
ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs na/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang / sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can
gang yang sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su

bkrol yang sems can gang yang yongs su grol bar byas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar
na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha bgos pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai dur+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul par byed do/ /de ltar bai dur+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i srid

mngon par sprul pa byed do/ /de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /skom 'dod pa rnams la skom gyi sbyin pa byed do/ /bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la

bzhon pa'i sbyin pa byed do/ /gos 'dod pa rnams la gos kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog gi sbyin pa byed do/ /phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed do/ /spos 'dod pa rnams la spos kyi sbyin

pa byed do/ /byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa'i sbyin pa byed do/ /mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha'i sbyin pa byed do/ /khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyi sbyin pa byed do/ /'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba'i sbyin pa byed do/ /yo byad 'dod pa

rnams la yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang /

dngul 'dod pa rnams la/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul gyi sbyin pa byed pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa byed de/ des de ltar zas

'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa la bzhon pa byin/ /skom 'dod pa la skom byin/ gos 'dod pa la gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa la me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa la phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa la spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa la byug

pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa la mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa la khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa la 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa la yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa la nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu

tig dang / bai dur+ya dang dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa la ni/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul byin pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i

bar du byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to/ /sems can de dag gi kyang chos ston pa thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gi lam po che'i
bzhi 'dor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin / skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa
rnams la ni bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa

rnams la ni byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo

byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang / man

shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul byin pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor de la ci snyams du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang la yang
ci yang byin pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i srid mngon

par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/

phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho

ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang /

man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dur+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dngul byin pa nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung

ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can gang la ci yang byin pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor
de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
gnas shing / ched du bsam te skye ba yongs su bzung bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye shing de 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la

rab tu 'god do/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi

rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam

par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /

mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god de/ sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du chos bstan pa de dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor

'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs zhig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i

lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /

ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzung gyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad

la sems can rnams rab tu bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang /

tshad med bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /

stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad

dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad

med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang

po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par

thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /

mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa med do/ /rab 'byor de
ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po
bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab

tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ brgya la sems can thams cad bdag la rdo dang / dbyig pas brdeg cing mtshon gyis 'debs

kyang de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mi bya'o zhes go cha bgo ba byed cing / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu 'god par byed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu

ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi 'dor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar ba dang / rab tu 'god pa byas

na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gzhag pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod

pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po

bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul

zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba

dang gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang

dag par bskul zhing / gzhog go 'god do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun

du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang lus dang
sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems

can tshad med grangs med pa lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar
bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go/ /'god do/ /rab 'byor
ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god

pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi chos nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la yang 'khrug pa 'am/ 'khrug pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog pa dang 'god par byas te/ de ltar yang dag par

bskul ba rnams kyang / nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste

dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi 'dor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/
gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa

la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor

de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can

thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can

thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang

yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ tshu rol tam/ pha rol tu mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan

po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul te
bzhag cing bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod

kyang / sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chur sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shing / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung

gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig 'dod pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang

dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang /

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa
de dag thams cad kyang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/

'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /'di ltar ste pha rol tu

phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to/ /sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam

yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na

sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams

de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/

'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go/ /'god do/ /ji ltar bdag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de

ji ltar bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul

'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos

kyang ston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi

'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / sbyin

pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams

cad kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag

thams cad kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig

yod pa de dag thams cad kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na
sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do/ /ji ltar bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
