kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas la/ sems can pha rol kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog pa dang / rab tu dgod par byed pa 'di ni
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ bdag kyang bzod pa phun sum

tshogs pa yin la/ gzhan yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa la yang dag par skul ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/

bdag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson pa myi 'dor zhing / gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyor ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gsol pa/

bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ bsam gtan rnams la thabs mkhas par mnyam par gzhog kyang / de dag gi dbang gis myi skye zhing gzhan yang bsam gtan rnams la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par skul ba

byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ bdag kyang chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa myed par

chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin yang dmyigs pa myed pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par byed cing / sems can rnams kyang chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa myed pa dang / chos thams cad kyis rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba la myi dmigs

pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par skul zhing gzhog pa dang / rab tu 'god par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid

dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa

nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /
dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/ de la nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ nang gis chos shes bya ba ni/ myig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid de/ de la myi rtag
myi 'jigs pa'i phyir/ myig myig gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ rna ba rna bas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang

bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ sna snas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ lce lces stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin

pa'i phyir ro/ /myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ lus lus kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /mi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ yid yid kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i

phyir te/ 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do/ /de la phyi stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ phyi'i chos shes bya ba ni/ gzugs dang sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg dang chos rnams te/ de la myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong

ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i pa'i phyir/ sgra sgras stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ dri dris stong ste/ de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ ro ros stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /myi rtag mi 'jig pa'i phyir/ reg reg gis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ chos chos kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la phyi nang stong pa

nyid gang zhe na/ nang gi skye mched drug dang / phyi'i skye mched drug dang / 'di dag ni phyi nang gi chos shes bya ste/ de la myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ nang gi chos rnams phyi'i chos kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin

de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /phyi'i chos rnams nang gi chos kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang

yin pa'i stong pa nyid des/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la chen po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ shar phyogs

shar phyogs kyis stong / lho phyogs lho phyogs kyis stong / nub phyogs nub phyogs kyis stong / byang phyogs byang phyogs kyis stong / 'og gi phyogs 'og gi phyogs kyis stong / steng gi phyogs steng gi phyogs kyis stong /

de bzhin du phyogs mtshams rnams phyogs 'tshams rnams kyis stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la don dam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ don dam pa ni

mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ mya ngan las 'das pa de yang mya ngan las 'das pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la

'dus byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'dus byas shes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams te/ de la myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i khams 'dod pa'i khams kyis

stong ngo / /gzugs kyi khams gzugs kyi khams kyis stong ngo / /gzugs myed pa'i khams gzugs myed pa'i khams kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa

nyid ces bya'o/ /de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'dus ma byas shes bya ba ni gang la skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba myed pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas shes bya ste/ myi rtag myi

'jig pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas de ni 'dus ma byas kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/

gang la mtha' myi dmyigs pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa ste/ myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa mtha' las 'das pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni mtha' las 'das

pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la thog ma myi dmyigs shing / tha ma yang myi dmyigs pa de la 'gro ba myi dmyigs 'ong ba myi dmyigs te/ myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ thog ma dang

tha ma myed pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pas stong ngo / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la gang yang dor

ba myed pa ste/ myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ dor ba myed pa dor ba myed pas stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'dus

byas sam 'dus ma byas kyang rung ste/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ma

byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas te/ myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i

phyir te/ 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa

dang / myig dang rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i

rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus

kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te

reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / gzugs yod pa'i chos dang / gzugs myed pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas kyi

chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos te/ 'di dag ni chos thams cad ces bya'o/ /de la myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir / chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i

phyir te/ 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gzugs ni 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid/ tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid/ 'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan

nyid/ 'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid/ phung po ni sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid/ khams ni gdug pa'i mtshan nyid/ skye mched ni skye ba'i

sgo'i mtshan nyid/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni 'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gtong ba'i mtshan nyid/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gdung ba med pa'i mtshan

nyid/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'tshig pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thub pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yang dag par 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chags pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni 'khrug pa myed pa'i mtshan nyid/ byang chub

kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun ni 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ni dben pa'i mtshan nyid/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ni zhi ba'i mtshan nyid/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon

pa myed pa ni sdug bsngal sel ba'i mtshan nyid/ rnam par grol ba ni rnam par 'grel pa'i mtshan nyid/ stobs rnams ni shin tu rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid/ myi 'jig pa rnams ni shin tu brten pa'i mtshan nyid/

so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni myi chod pa'i mtshan nyid/ byams pa chen po ni phan pa bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid/ snying rje chen po ni yongs su skyob pa'i mtshan nyid/ dga' ba chen po ni rab tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid/

btang snyoms chen po ni 'dre ba myed pa'i mtshan nyid/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ni myi 'phrog pa'i mtshan nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid de/ myi rtag

myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i rang rang gi mtshan nyid de dag gis chos de dag thams cad stong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

de dag gi rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de yang myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la 'das pa myi dmyigs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa myi dmyigs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i

gnas myi dmyigs pa ste/ myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ myi dmyigs pa myi dmyigs pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /de la dngos po

med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ chos thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir/ 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid med de/ myi rtag myi 'jig pa'i phyir/ 'dus pa 'dus pas stong ngo / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de

yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ni dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo / /dngos po myed pa ni dngos po myed pas stong ngo / /rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo / /gzhan

gyi dngos po ni gzhan gyi dngos pos stong ngo / /de la dngos po dngos po zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ phung po lnga po ste/ phung po de dag kyang phung po rnams kyis stong pas/ de ltar na dngos po dngos pos stong ngo / /ji ltar na dngos po myed pa dngos

po myed pas stong zhe na/ dngos po myed pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas te/ 'dus ma byas de yang 'dus ma byas kyis stong pas/ de ltar na dngos po myed pa dngos po myed pas stong ngo / /ji ltar na rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong

zhe na/ rang bzhin zhes bya ba ni ngo bo nyid ma nor ba ste/ de la stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes pas ma byas/ mthong bas ma byas te/ 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ /de la gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/
de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon myed pa nyid dang / de
bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de bzhin du gnas pa ste/ de ltar chos de dag gi gzhan gyis stong pa gang yin
pa de ni/ gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid ces bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po dgu pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la

'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung
rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig
bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyam

pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje

dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snrel gzhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la rten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa dam pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab sgron ma

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge

dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmyigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mying nges par

'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas myed par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yo ba

myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems myed par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin dang / myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su gcod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /

nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par mngon par sgrub

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'dor ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong
du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda' dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar
ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par dmyigs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa'i mchog
thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad myi shes pa'i za ma rtog
ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal
ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'thun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma myed pa zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyan chen po

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul myed cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
gnas dmyigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa myed pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u brgyad do// // de la dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi

spyod yul la spyod pa ste/ 'di ni dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin des ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyas btab pa lta bur 'gyur

ba ste/ 'di ni rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sing ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam par rtse ba ste/

'di ni sing ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni zla ba bzang zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /

de la zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
to/ /de la chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags pa ste/ 'di ni
chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams cad kyis phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad

myi 'gyur ba'i phyag rgyas btab pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing

ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba ste/ 'di ni spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos kyis dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge
'dzin de la gnas shing / chos kyi dbyings su rtog par 'gro ba ste/ 'di ni chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan nges par 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig par myi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting

nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar

rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa ste/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin to/ /de la 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin to/ /de la dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rnam par 'god pa ste/ 'di ni dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag

par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nges pa'i tshig la gdon myi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig

bstan pa la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni nges pa'i tshig la gdon myi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin

de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshig bla dgas la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyogs rnam par lta ba ste/ 'di ni phyogs rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang

zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyam pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe

na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad nyam par myi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyam pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du zhing khongs su chud par 'dod pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /

de la nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa ste/ 'di ni nam mkha' rgyas par

'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni

rdo rje dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ji ltar rgyal mtshan dam pa bzhin du ting nge 'dzin

thams cad las 'phags pa ste/ 'di ni rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /

ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang thob pa ste/ 'di ni dbang po'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
rgyun gyi rjes su ma log par yang dag par zhugs pa ste/ 'di ni rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / rdul dang dri ma thams cad rab tu spangs pa'i dbang du gyur cing / ji ltar seng ge'i rgyal po bzhin du dbang thob pas bsgyings pa lta bu ste/ 'di ni seng ge

rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'khor ba'i rgyun rnams rgyun gcod par byed pa ste/ 'di ni

snrel gzhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyon mongs pa spong pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma rab tu sel ba ste/

'di ni nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad lham me lhan ne lhang nger

byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'tshol ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang tshol ba myed pa ste/ 'di ni tshol ba myed

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gnas la brten pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang gnas la rten par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni

gnas la rten pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sems kyang myi 'byung ba rnams kyang myi rgyu ba ste/ 'di ni sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dri ma myed pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma dri ma myed par byed pa ste/ 'di ni dri ma myed pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin to/ /de la 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / 'od mtha' yas par byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'od byed

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin 'di thob ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od byed pa ste/ 'di ni 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/

ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la

gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dag pa mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'od dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /

ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dri ma sel ba ste/ 'di ni 'od dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi

dga' ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin

thams cad kyi sgron ma byed pa ste/ 'di ni glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zad myi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin

thams cad zad shes pa dang / zad myi shes pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ 'di ni zad myi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la myi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge

'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rab tu thob pa ste/ 'di ni myi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge

'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang / stobs rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad myi shes par rjes su mthong nas/ rdul tsam yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba de ltar mthong ba ste/ 'di ni zad

pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la myi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad myi g.yo myi 'gul rab tu myi 'byed/ rlom

sems su myi byed pa ste/ 'di ni myi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'jig pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig par

yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni 'jig pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin

thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zla ba dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams

cad mun pa myed par byed pa ste/ 'di ni zla ba dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la shes rab kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ma

rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sel bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /

ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge

'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de

la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bya ba rnams byed pa ste/ 'di ni bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin

de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes dpal yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni ye shes dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang

zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong bar khong du chud par byed pa ste/ 'di ni rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
to/ /de la sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / sems myi g.yo rnam par myi g.yo rnam par myi ldog /yongs su yi 'chad par myi 'gyur/

nyams su myi bde ba myed la/ de la sems zhes bya ba ni 'di yin zhes bya bar sems myi 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/

ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / thams cad snang bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la

gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /

ting nge 'dzin thams cad rin chen mtha' ltar kun nas snang ba ste/ 'di ni rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la

gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad phyag rgya myed pa'i mthas/ phyag rgyas btab pa nye bar bzung bas phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /

de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang mnyam pa nyid du ma chud pa myed par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni

chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad

kyi dga' ba spong pa ste/ 'di ni dga' ba spong pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi mun pa sel

ba dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni chos kyis 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/

ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad rnam par 'thor ba ste/ 'di ni rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang

zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yi ge

mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge mnyam pa nyid rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yi ge gcig kyang dmyigs pa myed pa ste/ 'di ni yi ge dang

bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dmyigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dmyig pa 'chad par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni

dmyigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'gyur ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad 'gyur ba myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni 'gyur ba myed

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi rnam pa tsam yang dmyigs pa myed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa

myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nges pa'i mying la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nges pa'i tshig thams cad ni yang dag par dmyigs su myed cing tha snyad la stos

pa tsam mo zhes rtog par 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni nges pa'i mying la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gnas myed par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin

thams cad kyi gnas dmyigs pa myed pa ste/ 'di ni gnas myed par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rab rib myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams

cad kyi rab rib rnam par sel ba ste/ 'di ni rab rib myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod pa yang

dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la g.yo ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad g.yo ba

myed par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni g.yo ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams

cad kyi yul las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/ 'di ni yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas

shing / chos thams cad dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yon tan gyi tshogs rjes su 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sems myed par gnas pa zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la sems myi 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni sems myed par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing

gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rab tu 'thob pa ste/

'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la spob pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spobs pa mtha'

yas pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad

la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa rab tu 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin
de la gnas shing / khams gsum pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba ste/ 'di ni chos thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yongs su gcod pa byed pa zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyun mthong ba ste/ 'di ni yongs su gcod pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la
nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / chos thams cad la nem nur rnam par sel ba rab tu 'thob pa ste/

'di ni nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gnas su bya ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad kyi gnas yang dag par rjes

su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni gnas su bya ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la cig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos gang yang gnyis su yang dag par rjes

su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad dang /

ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/

ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa 'dor ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad gnyis su myed par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa 'dor ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams

cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes la zhugs nas/ de la zhugs pa'i phyir khong du chud pa gang yang myed pa ste/ 'di ni

rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la brda' dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi brda' dang

sgra la 'jug pa ste/ 'di ni brda' dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad yi ge

dang bral bar rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad gzi brjid kyis

lham me lhan ne lhang nger byed pa ste/ 'di ni sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mtshan nyid yongs su spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams

cad kyi mtshan nyid yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni mtshan nyid yongs su spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la mngon par dmyigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /

ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon par dmyigs pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste/ 'di ni mngon par dmyigs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge

'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /

de la bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bde ba dang sdug bsngal yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba

ste/ 'di ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zad myi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin

thams cad zad par rung bar yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni zad myi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gzungs kyi blo gros ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas

shing / gzungs thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs kyi blo gros shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la

gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag pa dang / log par yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni yang dag pa dang / log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la

'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'gal ba dang 'gog pa yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/

'di ni 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'thun pa dang 'gal ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge

'dzin thams cad la 'thun pa dang 'gal ba yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni mthun pa dang 'gal ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la 'od dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge

'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni 'od dri ma myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de

la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi snying po yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la zla ba dri ma myed par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni zla ba dri ma myed par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / dag cing gsal ba'i 'od kyi sems can gyi ris snang bar byas shing mun pa mun nag gi tsha ba'i gdung ba

sel bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyan chen po

dang ldan par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni rgyan chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams

cad snang bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /

ting nge 'dzin thams cad la 'khrug pa yang myi dmyigs rtse gcig kyang myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan

pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang chos thams cad rdul can dang rdul dang bral bar mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni rdul dang bral cing rdul dang bral ba'i

tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad nyon mongs pa

myed par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa

thams cad nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la gnas dmyigs su myed pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing /
ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi kun gzhi nye bar myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni gnas dmyigs su myed pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la de bzhin nyid la gnas shing / sems myed pa zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las mi ldog pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin nyid la gnas shing / sems myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin to/ /de la lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi lus myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni lus kyi

skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin
thams cad kyi ngag gi las myi dmyigs pa ste/ 'di ni ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la nam mkha' ltar chags pa myed pas rnam par grol zhing

gos pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de la gnas shing / chos thams cad nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa 'thob pa ste/ 'di ni nam mkha'

ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o/ /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u dgu'o// // rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi

ste bzhi gang zhe na/ lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/ /de la lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gang zhe na/

rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang gi lus la de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyis rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags

sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par stsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam la rnam par mi rtog go/ /phyi'i lus la de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can

shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam la rnam par myi rtog go/ /

phyi nang gi lus la de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing /

rnam par spyod kyang lus dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam la rnam par myi rtog go/ /nang gi tshor ba la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan

pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam la rnam par mi rtog go/ /phyi'i lus la de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i

rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog

pa rnam la rnam par mi rtog go/ /phyi nang gi tshor ba la de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi

bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / tshor ba dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam la rnam par myi rtog go/ /nang gi sems la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can

shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam la rnam par myi rtog go/ /

phyi'i sems la de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod kyang

sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go/ /phyi nang gi sems la de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/

'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang sems dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go/ /nang gi chos la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis

chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par

rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi rtog go/ /phyi'i chos la de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde

ba rnam par bstsal cing / rnam par spyod kyang chos dang ldan pa rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par mi rtog go/ /phyi nang gi chos la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can
shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod kyang / chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams la rnam par myi
rtog go/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / rnam par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
'gro na 'gro'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'greng na 'greng ngo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /'dug na 'dug go zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /nyal na nyal lo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /de'i lus

nyams bde ba dang nyams mi bde yang rung ste/ ji lta ji ltar gnas pa/ de lta de ltar des rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nang gi lus la de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul

gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nang gi lus de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod de/ de 'gro 'am 'ong yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ lta 'am rnam par lta

yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ bskum 'am rkyang yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ sbyar ma dang lhung bzed 'chang zhing spyod kyang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ zos pa dang 'chos pa dang 'thungs pa dang / myangs ba la

yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ nyal ba dang gnyid kyis mya myo bstsal ba la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ 'greng ba dang 'dug pa la yang shes

bzhin du spyod pa yin/ gnyid kyi log gam ma log na yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ smra ba dang myi smra na yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin/ nang du yang dag par 'jog pa la yang shes bzhin du spyod pa yin te/

rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang

ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran zhing dbugs nang du

rgyu na yang / dran zhing dbugs nang du rgyu'o/ /zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu na yang / dran zhing dbugs phyir rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs nang du ring du rgyu na yang / dbugs nang du ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes

so/ /dbugs phyir ring du rgyu na yang / dbugs phyir ring du rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs nang du thung ngu rgyu na yang / dbugs nang du thung ngu rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs phyir thung ngu rgyu na yang / dbugs phyir thung ngu

rgyu'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes ste/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba 'am/ 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i mchan bu mkhas pa ni/ ring du bskor na ring du bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /thung ngu

bskor na thung ngu bskor ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran par dbugs nang du brgyus na yang / dran par dbugs nang du

brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dran par dbugs phyir brgyus na yang dran par dbugs phyir brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs ring du nang du brgyus na yang / dbugs ring du nang du brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs

ring du phyir brgyus na yang / dbugs ring du phyir brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /dbugs thung ngu nang du brgyus na yang / dbugs thung ngu nang du brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ dbugs thung ngu phyir brgyus na
yang / dbugs thung ngu phyir brgyus so zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam

par spyod do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do/ /chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang /

rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam par yang dag par ci lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ ba lang gi shen pa 'am/ ba lang gi shen pa'i mchan bu mkhas pas mtshon rnon

po thogs te/ ba lang bsad cing bag bzhir gshags te/ de ltar so sor phye nas/ 'greng ngam 'dug ste/ de la rab tu rtog pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

spyod pa yang / lus 'di la sa'i khams kyang yod do/ /chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang yod do zhes bya bar khams kyi rnam pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na/

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'greng ngam 'dug ste/ nang gi lus la de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes

bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan cad/ skra dang glad pa man chad du/ sen mo dang spu dang pags pa yan chad du myi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/

lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang sen mo dang pags pa dang / glog pa dang / sha dang chu ba dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang pa dang / snying dang mkhal ma dang mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / mtsher pa dang / long ka dang / rgyu ma dang / nye ma dang /

nang rol dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / rngul dang / tshil dang / snabs dang / ngar snabs dang / rnag dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu ser dang / kha chu dang / dri ma dang / glad pa dang / glad rgyas dang rngu ma dang /

rna spabs dag kyang yod do/ /zhes bya bar yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog ste/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chun pa'i skye snod til dang / yungs kar dang / sran chung dang / bal sran dang / nas dang gro dang / 'bras dang /

'bru sna tshogs kyis gang ba myig dang ldan pa'i myi zhig gis phye ste/ bltas na/ 'di ni til lo/ /'di ni yungs kar ro/ /'di ni sran chung ngo / /'di ni bal sran no/ /'di ni nas so/ /'di ni gro 'o/ /'di ni 'bras so/ /

'di dag ni de ma yin pa'i 'bru gzhan no zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang lus 'di nyid la rkang pa'i mthil yan chad/ skra dang spyi bo man chad sen mo dang /

spu dang / pags pa yan chad du mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis gang bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog ste/ lus 'di la skra dang / spu dang / sen mo dang / pags pa dang / glog pa dang / sha dang / chu ba dang / khrag dang /

rus pa dang / rkang dang / snying dang / mkhal ma dang / mchin pa dang / glo ba dang / mtsher pa dang / long ka dang / rgyu ma dang / gnye ma dang / nang grol dang / gcin dang / phyi sa dang / mchi ma dang / dngul dang / tshil dang / snabs dang /

ngar snabs dang / rnag dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / chu ser dang / kha chu dang / dri ma dang / glad pa dang / glad rgyas dang / rngu ma dang / rna spabs dag kyang yod do zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtog go/ //

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus de myi dmyigs

pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod na yod pa'i gzugs sna tshogs/ dur khrod du bor ba/ ro'i mal du bsnyal ba/
shi nas zhag cig lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag gnyis lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag gsum lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag bzhi lon pa 'am/ shi nas zhag lnga lon pa 'am/ rnam par bam pa 'am/
rnam par sngos pa 'am/ rnam par rnag pa 'am/ rnam par zos pa 'am/ rnam par 'thor ba mthong na/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can no/ /'di lta
bu'i rang bzhin can te/ chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o/ /zhes bya bar nye bar sbyor ro/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

tshe/ phyi'i lus de la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal

cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod du bor ba'i ro/ /shi nas zhag drug lon pa 'am/ shi nas

zhag bdun lon pa 'am/ bya rog gam/ khwa 'am/ 'ol ba 'am/ bya rgod dam/ spyang ki 'am/ wa 'am khyi 'am/ de ma yin pa'i srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs kyis bza' ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi/

tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang de lta bu'i chos can/ de lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ chos nyid de lta bu las ma 'das so/ /zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/
'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

nam dur khrod du bor ba'i ro rnam par zos pa/ myi gtsang bas rnags pa/ sungs pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di yang tshul 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang

bzhin can/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de

myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /

rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa/ keng rus sha ra ri dang / khrag ra ri chags pa/ rgyus pas brang breng
du 'brel ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o/ /

zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta
zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa keng rus sha dang khrag myed pa/ rgyus pa'i gzungs myed pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di

nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi
chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam

dur khrod kyi rus pa keng rus gzungs myed pa gyes pa dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa/ sa la rnam par 'thor ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i
chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o/ /zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi
chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
nam dur khrod kyi rus pa sa la phyogs dang mtshams su rnam par 'thor ba / rkang pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ byin pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ brla'i rus
pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ dpyi'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ tshigs pa'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ rtsib ma'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ 'jing pa'i
rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor/ mgo'i rus pa rnams kyang gzhan du 'thor ba mthong na/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di lta
bu'i rang bzhin can te/ chos nyid 'di lta bu las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam
par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma
lon pa rlung dang nyi mas gdungs pa/ dung gi mdog ltar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyang de dang nye bar sbyor te/ lus 'di yang 'di lta bu'i chos can 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can te/

'di lta bu'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa'o zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs

pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam dur khrod kyi rus pa lo du ma lon pa rab rib snang ba/ sngon por gyur pa thi ba'i mdog

ltar gyur pa/ zags pa brul ba sa'i rdul dang 'gran 'gren du gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe/ de lus 'di nyid kyi tshul yang de dang sbyor te/ lus 'di nyid kyang 'di lta bu'i chos can/ 'di bu'i rang bzhin can te/ 'di lta bu'i chos nyid las
ma 'das pa'o/ /zhes bya bar nye bar rtog go/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs
pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /

phyi'i lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing

rnam par spyod do/ /phyi nang gi lus la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba

rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /nang gis tshor ba la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang

yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi'i tshor ba la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi

chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi nang gi tshor ba la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang
ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /nang gi sems la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes
bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi'i sems la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta
zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi nang gi sems la de myi dmyigs
pa'i tshul gyis sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing
rnam par spyod do/ /nang gi chos la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang
yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi'i chos la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lus kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig

rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /phyi nang gi chos la de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran
pa dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid myi bde ba rnam par bstsal cing rnam par spyod do/ /rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /
rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sdig to myi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnam myi bskyed pa'i phyir/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa skyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus

rtsom mo/ /sems kyi mthu bskyed do/ /yang dag par smon lam 'debs so/ /sdig to myi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi mos pa bskyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus
rtsom mo/ /sems kyi mthu skyed do/ /yang dag par smon lam 'debs so/ /dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi mos pa skyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus brtsom

mo/ /sems kyi mthu bskyed do/ /yang dag par smon lam 'debs so/ /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / phyir zhing bsgom pa dang / nyams par myi 'gyur ba dang / yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/
de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mos pa skyed cing rtsol lo/ /brtson 'grus brtsom mo/ /sems kyi mthu bskyed do/ /yang dag par smon lam 'debs so/ /rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la
gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa sgom mo/ /brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa
'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong pas yongs su grub pa sgom mo/ /sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben

pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa sgom mo/ /dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa la gnas pa/
'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa bsgom ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar dbang po lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i

dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan

yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar stobs lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang /
shes rab kyi stobs ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i

theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang
dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/ /de la dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa yang dag byang chub gyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su
grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas
yongs su grub pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas
yongs su grub pa/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /de la dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su

grub pa/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /de la shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod pa'i tshe/ shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de myi dmyigs

pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /de la ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin yang

dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /de la btang snyoms

yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa la
