gnas pa 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan

lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag

pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de la yang dag pa'i lta ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag

pa'i lta ba dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /de la yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang
zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la
gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /yang dag pa'i ngag gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i ngag dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/
rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa

de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba

dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs

su grub pa/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /yang dag pa'i dran pa gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
yang dag pa'i dran pa dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa/ de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /

yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin dben pa la gnas pa/ 'dod chags dang
bral ba la gnas pa/ 'gog pa la gnas pa/ rnam par spong bas yongs su grub pa de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom pa byed do/ /rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg

pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma myed pa'i

nge 'dzin dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad rang gis mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du rtog pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste 'di ni

stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la mtshan ma myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed par rtog pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa mtshan ma myed pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni mtshan myed pa'i

ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba myed do/ /zhes mngon par 'du myi byed pa'i tshe/ sems gnas pa smon pa myed pa rnam par thar

pa'i sgo ste/ 'di ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo de dag la zhum pa med par dran pa bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di ltar shes pa bcu gcig ste/ bcu gcig gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa dang /

kun 'byung ba shes pa dang / 'gog pa shes pa dang / lam shes pa dang / zad pa shes pa dang / myi skye ba shes pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob shes pa dang / 'dris pa shes pa dang /

sgra ji bzhin shes pa'o/ /de la sdug bsngal shes pa gang zhe na/ sdug bsngal myi skye bar shes pa'o/ /de la kun 'byung shes pa gang zhe na/ kun 'byung ba spang bar shes pa'o/ /de la 'gog pa shes pa gang zhe na/
sdug bsngal 'gog par shes pa'o/ /de la lam shes pa gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes bya'o/ /de la zad pa shes pa gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug zad par shes

pa'o/ /de la myi skye ba shes pa gang zhe na/ srid pa'i rgyud skye ba myed par shes pa'o/ /de la chos shes pa gang zhe na/ phung po lnga sgyu mar yongs su rtogs shing shes pa'o/ /de la rjes su rtogs pa shes pa gang

zhe na/ myig myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rna ba myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sna myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lce myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lus myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa

dang yid myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sgra myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / dri myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / ro myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /

reg myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / chos myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / myig gi khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / gzugs kyi khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa'i

khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rna ba'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sgra'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa

dang / sna'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / dri'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lce'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes

pa dang / ro'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / lus kyi khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / reg bya'i khams myi rtag ces
bya bar shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / yid kyi khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / chos kyi khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang /

yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / chu'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / mye'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes

pa dang / rlung gi khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / nam mkha'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / ma rig pa myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / 'du byed

myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / mying dang gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / skye mched drug myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / reg pa myi rtag ces bya bar

shes pa dang / tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / sred pa myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / len pa myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / srid pa myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / skye ba myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa

dang / rga shi myi rtag ces bya bar shes pa dang / /de la kun rdzob shes pa gang zhe na/ sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyis sems sems kyis shes pa'o/ /de la 'dris pa shes pa gang zhe na/ gang gis lam shes pa

dang / yongs su byang ba shes pa'o/ /de la sgra ci bzhin shes pa gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes te/ rab 'byor 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar dbang po gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ yongs su ma
shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa rtogs pa'i dbang po'o/ /de la yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o/ /

zhes bya ba'i dbang po gang zhe na/ slob pa'i gang zag mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /
shes rab kyi dbang po yongs su snang bar ma gyur pa 'di ni yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dbang po'o/ /de la yongs su shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag slob pa yongs

su shes par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i dbang

po zhes bya'o/ /de la yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/ gang zag myi slob pa dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dad pa'i

dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni yongs su shes pas rtogs pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor
'di yang de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni ting nge 'dzin gsum

ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa myed pa la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa myed pa cing dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rtog pa dang bcas

pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas dben/ sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben

pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrub shing gnas te/ 'di ni rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la rtog pa myed la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin

gang zhe na/ bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar te/ 'di ni rtog pa myed la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rtog pa myed cing dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ bsam gtan
gnyis pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / cung zad

med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /'di ni myi rtog myi dpyod
pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran

pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang / skye ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa ste/
rab 'byor 'di yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po
ni 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ de la

bsam gtan bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/
dpyod pa bcas pa dang / dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas/ nang yongs

su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa myed pa dpyod pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las

'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o

zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed sdug

bsngal yang myed pa btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ de dag ni bsam gtan bzhi'o/ /de la tshad myed pa bzhi gang zhe na/

'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ gcugs myed pa/
gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas

shing rnam par spyod do/ /de la snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ gcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms

pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yang
pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ gcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas
gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do/ /de btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po/ shin tu yangs pa/ myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa/ gcugs myed pa/ gnod
pa myed pa/ ltod pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing myi dmyig

pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod do/ /de dag ni tshad myed pa bzhi'o/ /de la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes

te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye

mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa
thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dag ni gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o/ /

de la rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni

rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna
tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang
dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/

chung zad ma yod do zhes chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar

bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs zhing gnas te

de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do/ /de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
'dod pas dben/ sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /

de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud cig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa myed pa/ dpyod pa myed pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan
gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing / shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas ste/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams

kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang

spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal yang myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /
de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam
mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes te/ rnam shes mtha'

yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ chung zad ma yod do zhes chung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /

de rnam pa thams cad du chung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin

skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i bar du myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ de dag ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/ /rab 'byor
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gnas la 'ang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /gnas ma yin pa la 'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'das pa dag ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
las dang / las yongs su len pa'i rnam par smyin pa/ gnas kyi rnam pa dang / rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'jig rten ni khams sna tshogs can te/ 'jig rten ni

khams du ma'o zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /

sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang / tha ma shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /dbang po dang

stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta

ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /de rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ tshe rabs brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba dang / tshe rabs

bye ba brgya dang / tshe rabs bye ba stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dag kyang rjes su dran no/ /bskal pa cig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ bskal pa brgya dang / bskal

pa stong dang / bskal pa brgya phrag stong nas/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi bar dag kyang rjes su dran te/ bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go/ /mying ni 'di zhes bya'o/ /rigs ni 'di zhes bya'o/ /

rus ni 'di zhes bya'o/ /zas ni 'di za za'o/ /yun ni 'di srid gcig tu gnas gnas so/ /tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/ de ltar bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig du skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas

shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya bar rnam pa dang bcas/ sa mal dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mas sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran no/ /lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las 'das pas/

sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / /kha dog sdug pa dang / kha dog myi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang ngan pa dang / bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang / ngan song na 'khod pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dod

pa'i sems can rnams rab tu shes te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa dag gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa/ log par

lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o/ /sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid

kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa myi 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus zhig nas/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/ /

zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par grol ba zag pa myed pa/ rang gis mngon par shes pas mngon du byas te/ nye bar bsgrubs shing rnam par spyod do/ /bdag gi skye ba ni zad

do/ /bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa ni spyad do/ /bya ba ni byas so/ /rnam pa 'di lta bu gzhan ni myed do zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ rab 'byor de yang de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar myi 'jigs pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par

sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang

ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang / yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par

spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor kyi nang du sing ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang

rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa/ bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to/ /zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/

bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su

mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa thob pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ /

tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /gang yang

bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la bsten na/ bar chad kyi chos su myi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas myed de/ de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su

yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba myed pa thob

pa dang / myi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor kyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha

'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar myi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /gang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i

sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na/ sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar myi 'byung ngo zhes bya ba de lta bu'i gnas myed de/ de'i phyir bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram

ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma

mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca'o/ /'khor kyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ /tshangs pa'i

'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ rab
'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar

so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/
rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar

sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad do/ /bcwo brgyad gang zhe na/ gang gis nam la de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gis nam la

lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis

rjes su bstan te/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul ba mi mnga'o/ /ca co mi mnga'o/ /dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /
'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o/ /thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi mnga'o/ /ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o/ /mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /dgongs
pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa

yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o/ /sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes mngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /thugs kyi phrin las

thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /'das pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug

go/ /da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'di ltar gzungs kyi sgo rnams te yi ge mnyam pa nyid dang / brjod pa mnyam pa nyid dang / yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ge la 'jug pa ste/ de la yi ge'i sgo dang / yi ge la 'jug

pa gang zhe na/ a zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ra zhes bya ba ni rdul dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa stong pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /tsa zhes bya ba ni

'chi 'pho dang skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'chi 'pho dang skye ba med pas/ chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /na zhes bya ba ni ming dang bral zhing ming gi rang bzhin ma thob ma stor bas chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /la

zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das shing srid pa'i 'khri shing dang / rgyu dang rkyen yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /da zhes bya ba ni dul ba dang dul ba'i gnas su yongs su nges pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi

sgo'o/ /pa zhes bya ba ni bcings pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /Ta zhes bya ba ni dkrugs ma dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /sa zhes bya ba ni chags pa myi dmyigs pas chags par mi 'gyur/ 'ching

bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ba zhes bya ba ni ngag gi lam dang sgra yang dag par chad pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /

ya zhes bya ba ni yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /sta zhes bya ni khengs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ka zhes bya ba ni byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i

phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /sa zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid du mi dmigs pas mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da' ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ma zhes bya ba ni bdag gir bya ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /

ga zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /tha zhes bya ba ni gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /shwa zhes bya ba ni

dbugs dmigs su myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /kha zhes

bya ba ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /k+Sha zhes bya ba ni zad pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /Ta zhes bya ba ni sdod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi

sgo'o/ /dz+nya zhes bya ba ni ye shes dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /rta zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ha zhes bya ba ni rgyu mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /

b+ha zhes bya ba ni 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /tsha zhes bya ba ni mdog mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /sma zhes bya ba ni dran pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /hwa zhes bya ba ni

bod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /tas zhes bya ba ni mos pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /g+ha zhes bya ba ni sdug pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /tha zhes bya ba ni

bsgrub pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ma zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa med pas gang yang 'gro ba med cing 'ong ba med de/ gnas med cing 'dus pa med pa la nyal bar 'gyur ba med pas rnam par mi rtog pa'i

phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /pha zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ska zhes bya ba ni phung po dmigs su med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /yas zhes bya ba ni mi bde ba mi dmigs pa'i

phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ce zhes bya ba ni spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /ta zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/ /D+ha zhes bya ba ni g.yog pa mi dmigs pas mtha'

thug par gnas par 'chi 'pho med cing skye ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ de yan chad yi ge'i tha snyad med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang la yang gang gis tha snyad du bya ba dang / gang gis brjod pa dang / gang gis bstan pa

dang / gang gis bri ba dang / gang snang ba dang / gang klag par bya ba de lta bu'i mying gang yang myed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' bzhin du chos thams cad khong du chud par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni gzungs

kyi sgo la 'jug pa a las bstsogs pa'i yi ge bstan pa la 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis a las bstsogs pa'i yi ge la mkhas par bya ba 'di yongs su shes na/ de ni sgra

gang la yang chags par myi 'gyur te/ thams cad chos nyid kyis yang dag par bsgrub par 'gyur zhing sgra shes par bya ba la mkhas pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' gang gis a las bstsogs pa'i

yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya 'di dang / a las stsogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag thos te/ thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed cing gzhan la yang tshul dang ldan

pa'i blos ston na/ de la legs pa nyi shu yod par shes par bya'o/ /nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang ldan/ blos gros dang ldan/ rtogs pa dang ldan/ blo dang ldan/ dga' ba dang ldan/ ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan/ spobs

pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo 'di yang nyon mongs pa med par thob cing the tsom med par 'gyur la/ gzhan las ngag snyan pa thos kyang chags par 'gyur ba myed cing zhe gcod pa'i tshig thos kyang khong khro bar

mi 'gyur bas/ mtho ba med cing dma' ba med de/ tshul bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sgra la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / /phung po la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / khams la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / skye mched

la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / bden pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas te/ rgyu la mkhas shing rkyen la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / chos nyid la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /

dbang po rab dang tha ma shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang skye ba shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i rna ba'i shes pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / pha rol gyis sems shes par bya

ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / zag pa zad pa shes par bya ba

la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa bstan pa shes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba la mkhas shing ldog pa la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang / spyod lam la mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /

khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pa la mkhas pa yang 'thob par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo a las stsogs pa'i yi ge la 'jug pa 'di yang de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i

theg pa chen po'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ rab 'byor gang yang khyod 'di skad du ji ltar

na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing sa nas sar 'phar

te/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing / sa nas sar 'phar ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad 'pho ba med pas/ chos gang yang 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba

med de/ 'pho ba 'am nye bar 'pho ba med do/ /'on kyang chos thams cad kyis gang yin pa de la rlom sems su byed pa 'am/ sems med pa des yongs su sbyong ba yang myi byed pa ma yin la/ sa de yang yang dag par rjes su

myi mthong ngo / /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ /rab 'byor sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su sbyang ba bcu po 'di dag bya ste/

bcu gang zhe na/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lhag pa'i bsam pa las stsogs pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / mtshan ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir phan pa'i dngos po yongs su sbyang zhig sems can myi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sems

can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba dang / sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / len pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / des rlom sems su myi bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstan

pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / khyim mi dmigs pa'i phyir yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i mtshan

ma mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos kyi rnam pa myi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / chos kyi yang dag pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir

nga rgyal dang khengs pa bstsal ba yongs su sbyang ba dang / tshig mi dmigs pa'i phyir bden pa'i tshig yongs su sbyang ba ste/ rab 'byor yongs su sbyang ba bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang

po la gnas pas bya ba dag go/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas chos brgyad po 'di dag yang dang yang du yid la bya ba ste/ de la nan tan du bya'o/ /brgyad gang

zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba dang / bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa dang / rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs

su mi gtang ba dang / snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba dang / bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing rtsom pa ste/ rab 'byor chos brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gnas pas/ yang dang yang du yid la bya zhing / de dag la nan tan du bya ba dag go/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gsum pa la gnas pas chos lnga la

gnas par bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mang du thos pas mi ngoms shing de la yang yi ge la mngon par ma zhen pa dang / zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed cing des kyang rlom sems su myi 'gyur ba dang

sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed cing / yongs su sngo yang des rlom sems su mi 'gyur ba dang / dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med cing / des kyang rlom sems su mi 'gyur

ba dang / ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas kyang des rlom sems su myi 'gyur ba ste/ rab 'byor chos lnga po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gsum pa la gnas par bya ba dag go/ /

rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas/ chos bcu po 'di dag yongs su gnas shing gnas par bya ste/ de dag yongs su gtang bar mi bya'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/

dgon pa la gnas pa dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa mi btang ba dang / bslab pa yongs su mi gtang ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan
pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / rdzas thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang / sems zhum pa med pa dang / dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med pa ste/ rab 'byor chos bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po sa bzhi pa la gnas pas yongs su gtang bar mi bya zhing yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ba dag go/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas

chos drug po 'di dag yongs su spang bar bya ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di ltar khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba dang / dge slong ma dang bsten pa dang / rigs la ser sna byed pa dang / 'du 'dzi'i gnas

dang / gnod sems dang / bdag bstod cing gzhan smod pa ste/ chos drug po de dag ni yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /yang chos bcwo brgyad yongs su spang bar bya ste/ 'di ltar mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yongs

su spang bar bya'o/ /lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / khengs pa dang / phyin ci log rnams dang / the tsom dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug nyam rangs su 'dor ba ste/ chos bcwo brgyad po de dag ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa lnga pa la gnas pas yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa drug pa la gnas pas chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/

'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug go/ /gzhan yang chos drug yongs su spang bar bya ste/ chos drug gang zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /

srid pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /slongs mo pa mthong na zhum pa med par bya ste/ zhum pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas yid mi bde bar mi bya ste/ yid mi bde ba yongs

su spang bar bya'o/ /slongs mo pa mthong na slongs mo pas 'khrug par mi bya ste/ 'khrugs pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor chos drug po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa drug

pa la gnas pas yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas chos nyi shu mi bya ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /

sems can du 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /srog tu 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /gang zag du 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /chad par 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /rtag par 'dzin par mi bya'o/ /mtshan ma'i 'du shes su mi bya'o/ /rgyur lta ba dang /

mying dang gzugs la mngon par chags pa dang / phung po la mngon par chags pa dang / khams la mngon par chags pa dang / skye mched la mngon par chags pa dang / khams gsum la mngon par chags pa dang / khams

gsum la mngon par zhen pa dang / khams gsum la rten pa dang / khams gsum la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang / chos la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang /

dge 'dun la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang / tshul khrims la rten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags pa dang / chos rnams stong ngo zhes zhum par 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid dang 'gal ba ste/ rab 'byor chos nyi shu

po de dag ni bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /des chos nyi shu po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ nyi shu gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid rdzogs par bya ba dang / mtshan ma med pa mngon du bya ba dang / smon pa med pa shes par bya ba dang / 'khor gsum

yongs su dag pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba dang / sems can de dag la brnyas par mi bya ba dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs shing /

des rlom sems su mi bya ba dang / mi skye ba la bzod pa dang / mi skye ba shes pa dang / chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa dang / rtog pa yang dag par bstsal pa dang / lta ba rnam par bzlog pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnam

par bzlog pa dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi sa dang / dul ba'i sems dang / zhi ba'i sems dang / thog pa med pa dang / byams pa'i skabs shes pa dang / gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba ste/ rab 'byor

chos nyi shu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdun pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas

chos bzhi po 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi sems khong du chud par bya ba dang / mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta zhing

sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji ltar mthong ba de dag yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa ste/ rab 'byor bzhi po de dag ni yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i

chos so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas chos bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dbang po rab dang tha ma shes pa dang /

sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dang yang mnyam par gzhag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lus yongs su

sgrub pa'i phyir ched du bsam shing srid pa nye bar len pa ste/ rab 'byor chos bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa brgyad pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas chos bcu gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam mtha' yas pa yongs su bzung ba ste/ ji lta ji ltar smon pa

de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i skad shes pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas

nges par bstan pa shes pa dang / ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / rgyud phun sum tshogs pa dang / rus phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / tshe phun sum

tshogs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa dang / yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa ste/ rab 'byor chos bcu gnyis po de
dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa la gnas pas yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o/ /rab 'byor sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid

du brjod do/ /de skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa las
stsogs pa yongs su spyad pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/

dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po yang dag par sdud pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa las stsogs pa yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems

can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ tshad med pa bzhi ste/ byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang btang snyoms
mngon par bsgrub pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs su

sbyangs pa gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa sbyin pa de yongs su gtong ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gtong ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par skul ba dang / gzhog pa dang / rab tu gzhog par byed pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag bsten pa dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang bla ma la phu dud du bya ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge

ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas chos tshol zhing

nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos btsal ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang

ba gang zhe na/ tshe rabs thams cad du 'du 'dzin med par 'byung zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung yang de la bar chad byed pa gang yang myed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang

dang yang 'byung ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong nas/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

thob par gyur kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku la mos pa yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du gyur pa 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams

la chos ston cing / thog mar yang dge ba bar du yang dge ba tha mar yang dge ba/ yi ge bzang po/ don bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba'i tshangs pa'i spyod pa 'di lta ste/ mdo dang

dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa

dang / gtan la bab pa bstan pa dag yang dag par ston pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos rnam par dbye ba yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang / khengs

pa bstsal pa yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ nga rgyal dang / khengs pa ji ltar bstsal pa des/ nam yang rigs dma' bar mi skye ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nga rgyal dang / khengs pa bstsal pa yongs

su sbyang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshigs yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ji skad du smras pa de ltar byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa'i tshig

yongs su sbyang ba'o/ /rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dang po la gnas pa'i yongs su sbyang ba bcu'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang

zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yid la mi byed cing / de ma yin pa'i tshul khrims ngan par byed pa dang / byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba'i chos gzhan dag kyang yid la mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du gzo ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ phan pa chung ngu zhig byas kyang 'khor ba zad kyi bar du mi gzon na/ mang po lta ci smos te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byas pa shes shing drin du
gzo ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la gnod sems myed cing 'tshe ba med pa'i sems te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i mthu la gnas pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad theg pa gsum la yongs su smyin par byed

pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rab tu dga' zhing spro ba myong bar bya ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar

sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon

du bya ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du sems shing bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sems

can dmyal bar gnas par bya ste/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ma bkod kyi bar du/ de dag du gtub cing gshags pa dang / brdung zhing btso ba dang / bsreg pa las stsogs pa nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam ste/

de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don tu spro zhing skyo ba med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po mngon du bya ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing dad

pas gus par bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar bla ma rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes su byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla ma bsnyen bkur zhing dad pas gus par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing tshol ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ las gzhan med par sems can thams cad yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir las gzhan med par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su

tshol ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson zhing tshol ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mi ngoms pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'am/ phyogs bcu kun kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gang ji snyed cig bstan pa de dag thams cad yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /zhes mi ngoms pa ste/ 'di ni

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mang du thos pas mi ngoms pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing myed par chos kyis sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po chos ston pa'i tshe/ chos kyi sbyin pa des chung ngu na byang chub du yang re ba med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su sngo ba gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / bdag dang gzhan gyi sems kyi

zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngo ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su sngo ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med pa gang zhe na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis nye bar brten na/ sems can yongs su smyin par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i

dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar rtog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du nam yang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dpag tu med pa'i 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba med

pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems la smod pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i

ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa la gnas pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtang ba gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' ba ste/ 'di ni byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgon pa la gnas pa yongs su mi gtang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub la

yang 'dod pa mi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa chung ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa gang zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyang

rlom sems su myi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chog shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa mi btang ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar

chos zab mo rnams la mi rtog par gzhog pa'i gzod pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa mi btang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs

su mi btang ba gang zhe na/ bslab pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bslab pa yongs su mi btang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la

smad pa gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i sems mi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod pa'i yon tan la smad pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mya ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i

sems bskyed pa gang zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myang ngan las 'da' ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su gtang ba gang zhe na/ phyi nang gis chos thams cad 'dzin pa med pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzas thams cad yongs su btang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa med pa gang zhe na/ rnam par shes pa gnas pa la de'i sems mi gnas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zhum pa myed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med pa gang zhe na/ dngos po thams cad yid la mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med pa'o/ /de la byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing rdzus te skye ba dang / mgo bregs shing ngur smrig gi gos

bgo ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khyim pa dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/

dge slong ma dang se gol gtogs pa tsam du yang lhan gcig mi gnas shing / de'i rgyus yongs su sgom pa'i sems mi skyed cing / de'i rgyus gos 'thob par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i

dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/ gang bdag gis sems can thams cad la bde ba'i rnam pa bsgrub par bya ba de dag sems can 'di dag rang rang gis bsod nams kyis bde bar 'gyur na/ de la bdag gi ser sna'i sems bskyed

par mi bya'o/ /zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs la ser sna byed pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs

su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du 'dzi'i gnas gang du gnas pas/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas yod pa 'am/ de dang ldan pa'i gtam 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ de dang
ldan pa'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta bur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas par mi bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du 'dzi'i gnas yongs su spang ba'o/ /

de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnod sems yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ gnod sems dang 'tshe ba'i sems kyi skabs mi 'byed cing / thab mo'i sems sam/ rtsod pa'i sems kyi go mi 'byed pa

ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnod sems yongs su spang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ phyi nang gi chos rnams yang dag par rjes

su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod pa yongs su spang ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyi rol kyi

chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzhan smod pa yongs su spang ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam

yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ de dag ni 'di ltar bde 'gro la yang bar tu gcod na/ 'phags pa'i lam lta la ci smos te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta la smos kyang mi dgos kyis spang bar bya'o zhes spong ba

ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe

na/ de ni 'di ltar des chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med na gang gis nga rgyal du 'gyur ba'i lhag pa'i lta ci smos shes nga rgyal du mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i nga rgyal yongs su

spang bar bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des gang la khengs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po yang yang dag par rjes su mi

mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khengs pa yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ dngos

por mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyin ci log rnams yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug

nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba yin zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug

nyam rangs su mi 'dor ba'o/ /de la sa drug la chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la gnas te

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams shes par bya ba'i gang chen mtsho lnga'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to/ /phyin to/ /phyin par 'gyur ro/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'das pa dang /

ma 'ongs pa dang / da lta byung ba dang / mi brjod pa dang / 'dus ma byas te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su spang bar bya ba yin zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ nyan thos kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya ba'o/ /'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ rang sangs rgyas

kyi sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ sred pa'i sems yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ slongs mo pa mthong na sems zhum pa mi bskyed do/ /

'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ dngos po thams cad yongs su btang bas yid mi bde bar mi bya'o/ /'di ltar de ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin pas/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ kha za yag gi sems su mi bya'i

sbyin pa yongs su gtang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdag tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe

na/ de ni 'di ltar bdag shin tu med pa'i phyir ro/ /sems can du 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sems can shin tu med pa'i phyir ro/ /srog du 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar srog shin tu med pa'i phyir ro/ gang zag

tu 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang zag shin tu med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chad par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes pa'i phyir

chos gang yang chad pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par 'dzin par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos gang la skye ba med pa de la rtag pa dang / chad pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ji

ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma'i 'du shes su mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa shin tu med pa'i phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyur lta bar mi

bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des lta ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ming dang gzugs la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des de'i dngos

po yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ba'i phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phung po la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phung po shin tu med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na phung po la
mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ khams la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar khams rnams shin tu med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na

khams la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ skye mched la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar skye mched rnams shin tu med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na skye mched

la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ khams gsum la mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos po myed cing myi dmyigs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar

na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par brten par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de'i dngos

po myed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la mngon par brten par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum la gnas par mi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di

ltar de'i dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ khams gsum la gnas par mi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas la brten

pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par myi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas su lta ba la brten pas/ sangs rgyas mthong bar myi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sangs rgyas la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags

par myi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par myi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos su lta ba la brten pas/ chos mthong bar myi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen pos chos la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par myi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par myi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dge 'dun du lta ba la

brten pas/ dge 'dun mthong bar myi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ dge 'dun la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par myi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/

tshul khrims la brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par myi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims su lta ba la brten pas/ tshul khrims rnam par dag par myi 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ tshul khrims la

brten pa'i lta ba la mngon par chags par myi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos thams cad stong ngo zhes zhum par myi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ma yin gyi rang

gi mtshan nyid kyi stong pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ stong pa nyid la zhum par myi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar myi bya zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos

thams cad stong pa bas/ stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar myi byed pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ stong pa nyid dang 'gal bar myi bya'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/

stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yin zhe na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan ma myed pa mngon du bya ba yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan ma thams cad yid la myi byed pa'i phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i smon pa myed pa shes pa yin zhe na/

de ni khams gsum thams cad du sems myi 'jug pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /

de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing snying brtse ba yongs su rdzogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can thams cad la brnyas par myi bya zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid

du lta ba gang yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad la bstan pa dang dbri ba myed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dag pa'i tshul rab tu rtogs pa gang yin zhe na/ chos thams cad

tshul gcig tu rtogs kyang rtogs pa myed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba la bzod pa gang yin zhe na/ chos thams cad skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba

myed pa la bzod pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba shes pa gang yin zhe na/ mying dang gzugs myi skye ba shes pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i myi skye ba shes

pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa gang yin zhe na/ gnyis la yongs su rgyu ba myed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos

thams cad tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtog pa yang dag par bstsal pa gang yin zhe na/ chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa myed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta ba rnam par bzlog pa gang yin zhe na/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rnam par spong ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog

pa gang yin zhe na/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi sa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dul ba'i sems gang yin zhe na/ khams gsum la dag par sems pa myed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po'i zhi ba'i sems gang zhe na/ dbang po drug yang dag par 'dus pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thogs pa myed pa'i ye shes gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan thob pa'o/ /de la byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa'i skabs shes pa gang zhe na/ skye mched drug gi btang snyoms so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba gang zhe na/ 'khor
kyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag du lus ston pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can thams cad kyi sems khong du chud pa gang zhe na/ sems gcig gis sems can thams cad
kyi sems dang / sems las byung ba rab tu shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par shes pas rnam par brtse ba gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rnam par rtse

zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas blta ba'i don du 'gro yang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes su myi 'gyur ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta ba gang

zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig na 'dug cing dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong yang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes su myi 'gyur ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi

zhing de dag ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du yongs su bsgrub pa gang zhe na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams

yongs su gtong zhing / des rloms sems su myi byed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur ba gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i don tu chos la bsnyen bkur

ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du brtag pa gang zhe na/ chos kyi sku yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i dbang po rab dang / tha ma shes pa gang zhe na/ stobs bcu la gnas shing / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su rdzogs par shes pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba gang zhe na/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sgyu ma lta

bu'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad byed pa ste/ de'i sems chos gang la yang myi 'jug pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yang dang yang mnyam par gzhag pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par smyin pa las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta ji ltar 'grub pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su sgrub pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams ji lta ji ltar yongs

su smyin par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ched du bsams shing lus yongs su 'dzin to/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ched du bsams shing / srid pa nye bar len pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can

yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba yin zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ ji lta ji ltar smon pa de lta de ltar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang

dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phyed chen po'i skad shes par bya ba khong du chud pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pas khong du chud
pa'o/ /de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su rdzogs pa'i spobs pas nges par bstan pa shes par bya ba rtogs pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spobs pa so so
yang dag par rig pas khong du chud pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
tshe rabs thams cad du brdzus shing skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ma'i mngal du 'gro ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun
sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs chen por skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rigs phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/ bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho bar skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i rgyud phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis rigs su
sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'byung bar gyur pa de'i rigs su skye ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rus phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub tu sems can rnams bkod cing / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes ma

thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas rgyas par bkang ste/ de dag rnam pa drug du g.yo bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang / lhan gcig

tu mngon par 'byung zhing sems can de dag kyang theg pa gsum la nges par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mngon par 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rtsa ba gser gyi rgyu las byung ba yin/ lhun bai dur+yar 'dug pa yin/ yal

ga rin po che bdun gyi rang bzhin las grub pa yin/ me tog dang / lo ma rin po ce thams cad las gyur pa yin/ shing de'i dri zhim po dang / 'od bzang pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rgyas par gang ba
yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi shing gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun
sum tshogs pa gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya
ba gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /

so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs

pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs
pa nyid ces bya'o/ /rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin

pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen

po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog

ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa
