dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa

rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod
pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa

myed pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa dang / myi 'jigs pa

bzhi la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la spyod pa dang / dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ rigs kyi sa

las yang dag par 'da'/ brgyad pa'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ mthong ba'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ bsrabs pa'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ 'dod chags dang bral pa'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/ byas pa rtogs pa'i sa las yang dag par 'da'/

rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las yang dag par 'da'/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa las yang dag par 'da' ste/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de ltar sa dgu las yongs su 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas te/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bya'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag

brgya pa/ bam po bcu gnyis pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis gang yang 'di skad du theg pa de gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis khams gsum nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar theg pa chen po gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de gnyis ka yang ldan pa yang ma yin myi ldan

pa yang ma yin/ gzugs myed pa/ bstan tu myed pa/ thogs pa myed pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos ni 'byung ba 'am/ 'byung

bar 'gyur ba 'am/ byung bar gyur pa myed de/ rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung ba 'dod pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar

'dod pa de ni de bzhin nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni yang dag pa'i mtha' 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar

'dod pa de ni bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid

myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'dod chags zad pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rab tu byung ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod

du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'gog

pa'i dbyings 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ gzugs stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar

'dod pa de ni/ tshor ba stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'du shes stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid

myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'du byed stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du

zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gang gzugs stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /tshor ba stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung

ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /'du shes stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /'du byed stong pa nyid

ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /

med pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar

nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid

stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i

phyir ro/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid thog ma dang tha

ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos

thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /

dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis

stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar

'dod pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab

'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ dbang po rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ stobs rnams 'byung bar

'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod

pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni

khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa
myed do/ /stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung
ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa

myed do/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /yang dag par spong pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni yang

dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid

kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir

ro/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/

'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ bsam gtan rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed
pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ tshad myed pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed

pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ stong pa nyid 'byung

bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mtshan ma myed pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa

de ni/ smon pa med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas
pa myed do/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba

myed do/ /rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med

do/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum

nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /mtshan ma

med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du

gnas pa myed do/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni bsam

gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzugs

med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par

'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni

mtshan ma myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mngon par

shes pa rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos
rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /rab 'byor mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni
khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ mngon par shes pa

rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis

stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams

'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /

rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs

bcu'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /myi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /so so yang dag par rig bzhi'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa

bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid ni/

de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /myi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ myi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /so so yang dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ so so yang

dag par rig pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid
myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa skye bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rang sangs rgyas skye bar

'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' skye bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod
pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba
myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /rang sangs rgyas ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /byang chub sems
dpa' ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni khams gsum nas

'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ dgra bcom pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rang

sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid

ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor

gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i
'bras bu 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed

pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rang byang chub 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid 'byung bar 'dod

du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras

bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
gnas pa myed do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /rang byang chub ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni khams
gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa
myed do/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo nyid ni/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo

nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ rang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /lam gyi rnam

pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab

'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ ming 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mtshan ma 'byung bar 'dod du zad

do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ brda' 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ tha snyad 'byung bar
'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ gdags pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mying stong pa nyid ni khams gsum
nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /mtshan ma stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /
brda' stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa med do/ /tha snyad stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba med do/ /rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /gdags pa stong pa nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mying

stong pa nyid mying stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /mtshan ma stong pa nyid mtshan ma stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /brda' stong pa nyid brda' stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /tha

snyad stong pa nyid tha snyad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /gdags pa stong pa nyid gdags pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa
de ni/ skye ba med pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ 'gag pa myed pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed
pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ rnam par byang ba myed pa
'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /rab 'byor gang mtshan nyid myed pa'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'dod pa de ni/ mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa 'byung bar 'dod du zad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor skye ba
myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /'gag pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa

thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /rnam par byang ba myed pa'i

ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i ngo bo nyid ni khams gsum nas 'byung ba myed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

nyid du gnas pa myed do/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skye ba myed pa ni/ skye ba myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /'gag pa med pa ni 'gag pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /

kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ rnam par byang ba myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /mngon par
'du bya ba myed pa ni/ mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de ltar rnam grangs 'dis na/ 'di ltar theg pa chen po ni khams gsum nas byung nas/ rnam pa thams

cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par shes par bya ste/ gnas de ni bskyod du myed pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang khyod kyis gang 'di skad du theg pa chen po de gang du gnas par 'gyur zhes smras pa de ni/ theg pa chen po

de gang du yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni gnas myi dmyigs pa'i phyir myi gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar theg pa chen po de ni myi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas so/ /

rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du theg pa chen po de yang gnas pa yang ma yin myi gnas pa yang ma yin no/ /rab 'byor
