mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de/

myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /'dus ma byas stong

pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par

'gyur ba myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid

kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/

gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa

nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang

'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /thog ma dang

tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/

gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin

ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur

ba myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang

'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang bzhin stong

pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/

gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni

gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/

gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /chos thams

cad stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur

ba myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas

gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyis

rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/

mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas
par 'gyur ba myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang

'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni

gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba myed/ gang du yang 'gro ba

myed/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du yang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba myed do/ /dngos po med pa'i

gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor 'dus ma byas ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du yang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi
rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du yang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du yang 'gro ba med/
gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /'dus ma byas kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du yang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid ni
gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du yang 'gro ba med/ gar yang gnas par 'gyur ba med do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni 'ong ba yang med/ 'gro ba yang med/ gnas pa yang myed do/ /
rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du theg pa de la sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs so/ /phyi ma'i mtha' yang myi dmyigs so/ /dbus kyang myi dmyigs te/ 'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i

theg pa ste/ theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /zhes smras ni de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ theg pa 'di la sngon gyi mtha' yang myi dmyigs so/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang myi dmyigs/ dbus kyang myi dmyigs te/ dus

gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa ste/ de'i phyir na theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyang 'das pa'i dus kyis stong ngo / /ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma

'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong ngo / /da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong ngo / /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /theg pa chen po yang theg pa chen pos stong ngo /
byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong ste/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid la gcig ces bya ba myed do/ /gnyis shes bya ba med do/ /gsum shes bya ba med do/ /bzhi zhes bya ba med do/ /

lnga zhes bya ba med do/ /drug ces bya ba med do/ /bdun zhes bya ba med do/ /brgyad ces bya ba med do/ /dgu zhes bya ba med do/ /bcu zhes bya ba med do/ /tha dad ces bya ba med do/ /de bas na 'di ni byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa ste/ de la mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa myi dmyigs so/ /de la 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba yang myi dmyigs so/ /zhe sdang

dang zhe sdang med pa yang myi dmigs so/ /gti mug dang gti mug med pa yang mi dmigs so/ /ming dang ming med pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyang myi dmyigs so/ /dge ba dang mi dge ba yang myi
dmigs so/ /kha na ma tho ba yod pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa yang mi dmigs so/ /zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa yang mi dmigs so/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med

pa yang myi dmyigs so/ /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa yang myi dmigs so/ /skye ba dang 'gag pa yang myi dmigs so/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yang mi dmigs so/ /de la rtag pa dang
mi rtag pa yang mi dmigs so/ /bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba yang mi dmigs so/ /bdag dang bdag med pa yang mi dmigs so/ /zhi ba dang ma zhi ba yang mi dmigs so/ /'dod pa'i khams dang 'dod pa'i khams
las yang dag par 'da' ba yang myi dmyigs so/ /gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams las
yang dag par 'da' ba yang mi dmigs so/ /'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor 'das pa'i gzugs ni

'das pa'i gzugs kyi stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs

dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'das pa'i tshor ba ni 'das pa'i tshor bas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyi stong

pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'das pa'i 'du shes ni 'das pa'i 'du shes kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du shes dmigs
su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du shes dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'das pa'i 'du byed ni 'das pa'i

'du byed kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du byed dmyigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i 'du byed dmyigs par

'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'das pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su med de/ stong pa nyid
kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs kyis

stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmyigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmyigs par

'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i tshor bas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dmyigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong

pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du

shes dmyigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed ni ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed kyi stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed dmyigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ma

'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su

med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid da ltar byung

ba'i gzugs dmyigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba ni da

ltar byung ba'i tshor bas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dmigs

par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes ni da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes kyis stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes dmyigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang

stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du shes dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed ni da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed kyis stong ngo / /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmyigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i 'du byed dmigs par 'gyur ba

lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su med de/

stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs par 'gyur ba lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi

dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmyigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid
la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid

la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/

da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la
ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/

ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni

phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid

la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das

pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la yang mnyam pa nyid la myi

dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum

mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/

mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/

rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ nang stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/

mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor phyi stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/

phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ phyi stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/

mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/

ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor phyi nang stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa

nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/

mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig

smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni

da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs
pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/

ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos rab 'byor chen po stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ chen po stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/

chen po stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ chen po stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs

pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i

dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor don dam pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmigs/

don dam pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmigs/
mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus

dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ 'dus byas

stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus

myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs

pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa

nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das

pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i

dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid

la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong

pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni

dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang
myi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs

pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/
dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/
mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus
dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi

dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi

dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa

lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ chos thams cad

stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor

mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/
mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid stong

pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar myi dmyigs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum
mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung

ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i

dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni da ltar

byung bar myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus myi

dmyigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang myi dmyigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la myi dmyigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmyigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmyigs pa

lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmyigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa
stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa
nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa

lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni

phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam
pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig

smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i

ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la
mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar

gzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dus
gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus

kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta
yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi
dmigs/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/
mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci

zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi

rkang pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa
nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig
smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor dbang po rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ dbang po rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi

dmigs/ dbang po rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ dbang po rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs

pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs

pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor stobs rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ stobs rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ stobs rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/

stobs rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung
ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i

dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni da ltar byung bar
mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus
mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/
'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dus gsum mnyam
pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/

mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/
rab 'byor 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ 'phags pa'i bden

pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i
dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor bsam gtan rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ bsam gtan rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ bsam gtan rnams
ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ bsam gtan rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus kyang mi dmigs/

mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig

smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta ci yang zhig smos/ rab 'byor tshad med pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ tshad med pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/

tshad med pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ tshad med pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma
'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/
mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni
phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid
la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/
mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor mthar gyis gnas
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni
da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus
mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa
nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong

pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar
pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni dus gsum
mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung
ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/
da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor mngon par shes pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ mngon par
shes pa rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi
dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das
pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin rnams ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/
ting nge 'dzin rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/
mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni sngon
gyi mthar mi dmigs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ gzungs kyi rnams ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa
nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/
rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni da ltar
byung bar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam
pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig
smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni phyi ma'i
mthar mi dmigs/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi
dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus
dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/
so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs
te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus
kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus
dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas

kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mnyam pa nyid la 'das
pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ mnyam pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la
'das pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus dmigs pa lta ci zhig smos/ da ltar byung ba'i dus dmigs pa lta yang ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar
mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ nyan thos ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ nyan thos
ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni phyi ma'i

mthar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ rang sangs rgyas ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang
byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs/
de bzhin gshegs pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor de ltar byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la bslab shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
rten zil gyis mnan te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das
kyis de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di/ legs par gsungs pa ni legs shing dge ste/ bcom ldan 'das theg
pa chen po 'di la bslab shing 'os pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshad dang
grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ dpag tu ma mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'di nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes par gyur to/ /brnyes so brnyes par 'gyur ro// //
